I liked the few hours setting this tablet up so much I'm considering purchasing the 10 inch model for myself as a replacement to mine.PROS:Lightweight (really light honestly)Fast Processing timesSelectable screen freeze instead of an external buttonDual Cams (both have zoom options too)CONS:Works better with a stylus (the one that comes with the Roo Cases works wonders, not too accurate with "finger" touches for certain applications)Screen switching is too sensitive when on (doesn't take much for the screen to flip direction)Load times claim 10 secs or less, it's more like 15 secs average (or like a Win OS on a SSD)Slick surfaces (doesn't have a rubberized skin or something that feel "grippy")

Reviews.Title: Simply amazing...
Reviews.Author: Ann Rhodes
Reviews.Content: Once again Asus has given me a tablet that I absolutely adore. I purchased it for on the go reading because I didn't like the "front page "  of the kindle fire, but I am so tempted to start loading everything.I actually use it at its lowest brightness setting because it't really bright.

Reviews.Title: Nice device...
Reviews.Author: ENDER
Reviews.Content: Excellent display (1280x800) and large memory (16GB) with the fast CPU (1.2GHz). Compared to the other brand tablets, these are advantages. I'm fully satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Billy Godwin
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. On have complaint and that is the tablet is hard to unlock and is a bit slow when unlocking. Otherwise its great.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Randall Bancroft
Reviews.Content: I've had it for a week. Replacing my old Nook Color (which I still love). Great screen, light weight, quick, lots of apps to get you started. Battery lasts. People may complain about finger prints but really... not worse or better than other tablets. Very comfortable to hold - which I love. I plan on buying another.

Reviews.Title: Returning it ASAP
Reviews.Author: eoneill "Ed"
Reviews.Content: I have had this for 10 days. I really liked it, except it died today. Been on the charger all day, nothing changes.  Talked to tech support, they didn't have much to offer besides (send it in for repairs).  Being less than 2 weeks old, this will be returned and I will go with something else. I used it for less than 6 hours total and it is dead!I have had great other experiences with ASUS, but this is a POS.

Reviews.Title: Everything you want in a device at this price point
Reviews.Author: William R. Russell "Rick"
Reviews.Content: I've been buying original-style Kindle Fires for my kids. I wanted something similar, but with full Google app capabilities and expandable storage.The new ASUS MeMOPad HD fits the bill. I can drop a 16GB or 32GB card in there and turn it into a movie machine or a downloading node, then easily transfer the data to my computer without messing about with the terrible MTP mode. CPU power, RAM & general performance are all adequate for the types of apps that you'll be running on a 7-inch tablet. I've been playing full 3D games like Carmageddon and GTA: Vice City at 1280x720 with absolutely no performance problems. The display is fantastic with no color distortion at odd angles.Minor nits: Lack of any vibration was a surprise; I guess after using Android on phones for so long, I just expect it. Also, the speakers could be better. ASUS makes a big deal out of the audio quality, but it's just marketing. It's the same flat, tinny, no-stereo-separation speaker you'd get with any tablet. The color screen washes out in direct sunlight, again no real surprise for any device with a backlit display.Overall, the MeMOPad HD is a good tablet but a great value.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Fusiturns
Reviews.Content: Likes:$150Screen looks greatSD slotBattery lifeNot an Apple, Samsung or a pure Google product.Cons:Screen a finger print magnetEven though it’s not as smooth as some as the big name products, you can’t beat this product for $150 and all it features.

Reviews.Title: BEST Bargain Priced Tab Available NOW  11/9/2013
Reviews.Author: J. D. Patterson
Reviews.Content: Short and sweet; the BEST value in a serious tablet available NOW - 11.9.2013.No if's, and's or rebuttals.The next best SERIOUS fully-featured tab will run you another hundred bucks. Maybe more.As a bonus, ASUS support is very good to excellent.Do your research and you WILL buy this tablet.Period.Update 11.10.2013CNET did not like this tab very much in their 7.26.2013 review and I take exception to many of their comments. They did opine that the Android OS update to 4.2.2 might improve slow performance and it sure did IF the performance was slow to begin with (which I contend it was NOT).This tab is not slow, does not lag, is not hard to hold (get a case like everyone does), is not a lackluster design (is actually a Nexus clone) and does have above average sound (in both controls and quality).The OS update was performed with ease and if you are a new owner, do this update as soon as the battery has received its first full charge.This IS INDEED a great tab for the bucks and I am not sure why CNET was so harsh, and IMO, off base.I have since added a 32GB Class 10 Micro SD card, a nifty case, and a screen protector.And I stick by my guns.This tab rocks.UPDATE  11.30.2013Still pleases and amazes. Since I made this purchase a number of "cheap" tablets are now on the market, screaming insistently, "buy me, buy ME".. However, if in the market, do your research and COMPARE, because less is not always more.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Luis Felipe Chavarria Mora
Reviews.Content: I bought it because I had high expectations of hard working asus alone two months and try to communicate with the asus repair service are incompetent and, worst service I have ever received in my life. Final story a tablet that does not work and 140 dollars in the trash. I do not buy really be disappointed with the quality of this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Asus makes junk
Reviews.Author: SitkaCMark
Reviews.Content: 1. SD card constantly unmounts/remounts2. Random power-off/power-on3. Asus will not honor their warranty: purchased in January 2014, contacted Asus for warranty service March 2014. I live on my sailboat in Alaska and was told they would do nothing for me since I do not have a street address (I do have a PO box)This tablet isn't worth the cardboard box it came shipped in. Asus is not only a pretender, they fail to keep their word.

Reviews.Title: Good until it stops working
Reviews.Author: Mr Chris
Reviews.Content: Was great but unfortunately lasted only 9 weeks before it turned into a paperweight. Wont turn on. Do a search for 'My ASUS MemoPad HD7 wont turn on' and you'll see that this is a big big problem with these devices.On top of that there is no way of getting a service case made via the ASUS website as they will not let you submit a case unless you have the serial number of the device. The serial number of an Android device can only be found by turning the unit on..Amazon wont swap the unit as its past the 30 days, ASUS wont open a repair case as I cannot retrieve the serial number.So far as expensive paperweights go this one works well. Holds down multiple papers in even the strongest winds eventually the slippy plastic back causes the papers to come free. Next time I'm buying paperweights from ASUS I'll get one with a rubbery back that holds paper down a little better.

Reviews.Title: Asus memopad
Reviews.Author: Deborah Nelson
Reviews.Content: Love it when we first got the product.  Only had three months and the touch screen stopped working.  No the best deal for the money and have not found any way to fix the problem.

Reviews.Title: Bought two, both broken within 3 months!
Reviews.Author: Kelley A. Abella
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these, one for each of my middle schoolers to use at school. One of them has worked well but the other broke within the first 3 months. The touch screen became unresponsive despite any efforts to reboot or reset the device. I sent it in for repairs and was sent back the device in good working order... for about 1 month then the same problem occurred. I decided to just buy my son a new one since this one was obviously a dud. (After all, my other son's tablet is still working fine.) We received the new tablet but it broke within a couple of months, also. Completely unresponsive. I decided to just cut my losses and go with a different brand altogether. You may get lucky and get a tablet that works but I wouldn't risk it if I were you.

Reviews.Title: Best 7 inch tab with great power management
Reviews.Author: Karthik
Reviews.Content: I love the Asus Memo pad.. its best return for <$130.. I am able to use it with WiFi for more than 10hrs.. It has GPS, 5MP camera and a decent touch... this is worth for what you pay..

Reviews.Title: best tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: carla
Reviews.Content: I feel smart just because I bought this tablet! It has everything I wanted for a price that didn't make me feel used.  The camera works well, I watch my netflix, Skype easily, plenty of space for bunches of aps, GPS, I'm in love. Asus has my product loyalty behind this one.

Reviews.Title: exellent
Reviews.Author: ennis poota
Reviews.Content: Best tablet for the price, and don't let the price fool you, it is a great product, battery last long time.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Luvparis
Reviews.Content: Great tablet I purchased thus for my dons birthday. I've been using it and find that it functions very well and is a great product for the price I'm thinking sboyt purchasing another

Reviews.Title: Was great until it died prematurely
Reviews.Author: Beri Cohen
Reviews.Content: Capable tablet, good speed, great screen, good touch sensitivity especially with the supplied stylus.  Bought in November 2013, Died in May 2014 although was handled gently.  Not happy.

Reviews.Title: Good value!
Reviews.Author: Shannon R Windham
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my young teen. It has everything he needs and he's enjoyed it. Best value for the quality!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Ignatius
Reviews.Content: I own the tablet for about 8 months now.It is a great product, strong, durable, and portable. It allows me to bring it everywhere without worrying of it being too "heavy".I must admit that this tablet is faster than what I have expected in speed processing wise, and I'm very happy with it.The screen however, you must take care of it very carefully.I once accidentally pressed on it too hard, and then the screen or the "digitizer" no longer responds to my fingerprints. Only the undamaged side of the screen still works. I sent it in to ASUS, they fixed it, and it's all back to normal. Despite to this incident, I am very happy with what this tablet can provide me with. To be honest, I find this tablet more useful, and has so much more compare to an iPad (Nothing against it). I highly recommend this to you all tablet users, whether experienced, or new tablet users.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael and Rodline Mackey
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying using this tablet. It is my first tablet, but it was easy to learn to use. But no 5 stars because I had battery charging issues one week later. I had to trickle charge it via the computer USB port in order to use the electrical outlet charger. From time to time, the battery acts up, but I know what to do now, still it's not a perfect tablet.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Morgan Rhodes
Reviews.Content: My mom LOVES her tablet. I got it for her for Mother's Day & she loves everything about it. I purchased one for my boyfriend as well for his birthday coming up :]

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMOPad HD 7-Inch 16 GB Tablet, White (ME173X-A1-WH) Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Franklin Montes
Reviews.Content: A good tablet.My tablet it has a screen details inside you can see a blank line, I have using for two weeks and it's ok the line is there but not problem about it.Pro:-You get what you paid.-It's a good tablet for beginner.-Battery is good with videos I saw 3 hours videos and from 100% goes to 70%.Cons:-Cheaper Material, but please for 130$ it's fine.-Is slow when multitasking (but come on is a tablet not a laptop it's fine).-Some new games are not supported and won't work Example Injustice Gods Amoung Us (work fine on my Moto G).Is a good tablet for beginners, I am using with my baby 2yrs old and for the price it's fine. Need an update to Android (4.2.2 Jelly Bean)Asus made a good work but there are a lot of few details.

Reviews.Title: Worked well at first
Reviews.Author: Charles McGuire
Reviews.Content: Once I received the tablet, it was everything I expected.  Very easy to  use, lots of memory and perfect size.  Less than a month old, it would not power on and I had to return it on my dime to the ASUS factory for them to fix.  You would think they would send you out a new one rather trying to fix the old one.  I hear this is a very common problem with this tablet.  I would not purchase this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Indika Kularatne
Reviews.Content: After searching  for more than one month finally I decided to buy ASUS MeMOPad HD 7-Inch 16 GB tablet. It was an excellent choice and the tab is working fine w/o any issues. battery life is amazing and I can run any games on it. display, color, performance is excellent. Good deal for less than $150

Reviews.Title: All about tradeoff between quality and price
Reviews.Author: Javad Rahimipour Anaraki
Reviews.Content: ASUS MeMOPad HD is a nice tablet with good quality and the most important reasonable price.The screen resolution and sound quality is very good but you will find minor lags in some applications; however, the overall performance is good.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: P. Hill
Reviews.Content: For the money, this tablet does a lot.  So far, I have not learned all the functions but it is pretty friendly.  Easy to tote around.  The camera is best for stationary or slow moving objects.

Reviews.Title: I like it but....
Reviews.Author: Techy A.
Reviews.Content: I always like Asus products. It is priced reasonably and with reasonable quality.This tablet has a huge potential to be a great one if Asus does not modify the Android OS so much.The launcher crash happened right after I got it. Every time you hit the home key, the launcher crashes.It seems to be a common problem for MeMOPad HD 7. The solution is to install third party launcher from Google Play store or do a factory reset.I really want to make the Asus launcher work since it seems to be a pretty nice interface. However, even with latest update I still have this problem. I think it is about time for Asus to beef up customer supports on their website and get their acts together.

Reviews.Title: Asus Memopad
Reviews.Author: patty leavins
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a good for a first time device, especially for kids. Be sure to get the protection warranty if it is for a child. My two kids taught themselves to use them with very little help from me.

Reviews.Title: Great pad for the price
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Baker
Reviews.Content: The wife uses it for quick checks for email and web browsing. Easy to carry around and just the right size.

Reviews.Title: A great new toy!
Reviews.Author: S. Lee "waterwoman39"
Reviews.Content: I've been trying out and lusting after family and friends tablets for a year.  A bit of a technology junkie, I have 2 workable pc laptops and 2 MacBooks.  Then my daughter's tablet was stolen and it was her main communication tool for an extended European vacation of 9 months.  I started helping her select a replacement and got hooked on tablets  a second time.  Her decision was limited somewhat by her location but she had a pretty good selection.  When she got home though she was complaining about how slow it was and I remembered a few I had checked for her, Asus being a Company I favor, I saw prices dropping and had to get one of my own.  I'm so to getting it set up for my purposes, but the things I like best are the battery life and the speed of response.  I haven't used the front and rear cameras much and I see them as something that would be really nice for phone chats with my far flung family.  Too bad the family won't cooperate.  The size is more comfortable for me than my larger 8.9 tablet which is a nicer reader, but reading on it is quite acceptable.  This was a really good Amazon deal!

Reviews.Title: Great price for a tablet
Reviews.Author: April C. Craig "acerrel"
Reviews.Content: I have an Asus laptop.  When i was searching for a gift for  my daughter-n-law I saw this. I did a little research on it and found out it was a very good deal. She loves it.

Reviews.Title: 2nd unit has problems too
Reviews.Author: Scot Mayo
Reviews.Content: first unit has SIM slot problems within the first month. Square Trade is a joke!Amazon stepped up and replaced the unit with a new one...  now after 60 days, this unit is also have SIM slot problems... keeps saying to mount the SD Card....  "its already in the damn machine!".past my  Amazon return date, so I will work with American Express to return it for credit under their extended return policy.

Reviews.Title: Another dead Asus
Reviews.Author: Skalla
Reviews.Content: Bought this at Christmas, was a great purchase until 2 days ago. It powered off due to low battery, I charged it but now it won't power on no matter what. Have tried usb charging, overnight charge, it will not come on. I previously had a 10" Transformer that is now a 10" brick that I can't bring myself to to throw out. Save yourself the hassle and wasted money and just get a Samsung :(

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Ruth Henderson
Reviews.Content: Love this! Use it allll the time and all of the functions still work great. I have never had any issues with it this far. Its conveniently small and puts tons of apps st your fingertips.

Reviews.Title: This is not good.
Reviews.Author: Oscar
Reviews.Content: I bought one on January 16th, 2014 and the return or exchange is expired since February 22nd, I believe. Anyway, today is May 29th and this tablet turned off by itself and didn't respond no more. It's dead, it doesn't turn back on. Let's see if Asus could helps me with the warranty. Don't by any Chinese electronic via Amazon. So disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet great price...
Reviews.Author: antech
Reviews.Content: I bought mine in January and I'm happy with it. Less issues with it than my Samsung Galaxy tab 7.0 plus. Better resolution, more processing power, newer version of android, no touchwiz (Samsung's android eye candy overlay), just to name a few. Except for the one gentleman who has returned it 3 times so far everyone else needs to understand this is a budget tablet. I paid $128.99 locally so I can't complain it was a good deal for me and I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a tablet for reading ebooks, music, media streaming and video chat.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: Raine
Reviews.Content: For the price, this can't be beat. i ordered this two months ago, and it's still using nicely. I have a lot of apps esp Kindle, Google drive, games, and lots of other things that i like access too. Its wifi connection is instant once it knows automatically where to connect. It hasn't died on me yet, which amazes me for the cheap price... It's the same price as a Ipod nano...and it's still working well.The memopad app that it comes with is nice when drawing and writing, but the only downside is that there's no stylus that goes with it, like the Samsung tablets, so my writing and drawings are all scribbles. I don't want other styluses that are incompatible to scratch the screen.Mostly i just do lots of typing, editing of school papers or my own personal stories, and of course play my touchscreen games. It still has a lot of memory...Love this!!!!

Reviews.Title: Really like it, but randomly turned off..
Reviews.Author: M. Sederquist "Mypron @2013"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item on August 27, 2013 from Amazon. After about 4 months it began shutting off at random times and I would need to reboot it. This happened with full battery, or any state of battery. It only restarted on me two times while in use, the other times it was in standby. While using it, I found it very responsive and extremely nice. The screen was amazing and the UI was very good. The battery life was really good (even better when it would randomly turn off on me.. it would last for weeks!)I've sent the unit off to ASUS for service, but I'll be surprised if they fix it and send my original back.. To me it seems like a bad battery connection that only happens when it heats up or is set down..

Reviews.Title: AMAZING TABLET
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: This tablet is really good the screen is so clear and perfect colors and its just perfect in every way.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMOPad great buy for the price
Reviews.Author: Traveler
Reviews.Content: I really am enjoying my new Asus Memopad.  It is quick and I like the size of it.  I'd recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Four tries to find a tablet I liked and this is it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I tried so many tablets to get this one.  It's a good size, bigger than my beloved iPod and smaller than my husbands gargantuan tablet so it's easy to hold.  It has great internet speed and is able to show video quite well, I have no complaints.  I have even put the Dish app on here so I can watch tv on it.  The few games I play work without a hitch, photos show well and it takes decent photos, too.  I think this is one of the best tablets available and I should know, I think I bought them all!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price but not without its problems..
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: This thing is really great for the price. For a basic tablet you really can't go wrong.After doing lots of reviewing I settled on this one as a gift. It turns out if you let the battery die you run the risk of it never turning back on. They seem to have a problem where it completely drains the battery and then can't take a charge. Were already on the second one, but now we are just very careful about turning it off and charging it.Great product, bad glitch in the software...

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought it
Reviews.Author: outdoorman
Reviews.Content: Was about to buy the Sero 7 Pro tablet when I read about the ASUS MeMo Pad HD 7.  Everything I read was pretty good and there wasnt that much of a price difference.  Well Ive had it for about a week and I'm very happy.  Granted I'm no tech guy but this works fast enough for me and I like the picture clarity and sound quality.Like it so much I began looking for an ASUS laptop to replace my old laptop that recently went out on me.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Termini
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these. No question that they are the best bang for your buck. It is fast, screen is very good. I like this better than my sons ipad. More intuitive.

Reviews.Title: easily worth the money, would buy again
Reviews.Author: Joshua Westerfield
Reviews.Content: Battery life is amazing, got it for my son for his bday and ended up giving him my note 8 instead because the battery is so good.  It came with android 4.3 and has never been updated.  The battery life is equivalent to that of an ipad mini if kot slightly better.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Town Without  Pity
Reviews.Content: I have read many, many of the comments here and made note of some of the "problems."I have had this device for over a month, and have used it almost daily.  As far as I am concerned, it's perfect for my needs.  I read on it, I play a couple of word games, watch an occasional movie, play Xfinity's On-Demand tv programs, check Facebook, Twitter and email, and visit an occasional website.  This tablet is responsive, quick, and has very good battery life.  Of course, I cannot predict what may or may not happen to it down the road, but I have had a couple of netbooks in the past that had to be shipped back to the manufacturers for repair, meaning, any device can act-up at any time.My feeling about this device vs. cost, even if it quit after 2yrs or so, I would feel I've gotten my money's worth.  I paid $149, and I honestly do not feel that's an exorbitant amount for a couple of years use from a basic tablet.  High-end and high-price, IMO, doesn't mean the device won't crash and burn.  My son just had to pay $20 to ship back an expensive Smartphone device that went completely dead just past the year's warranty, and has no idea what it's going to cost to fix it.Getting back on track, for my needs, as mentioned above, this tablet is perfect.  Fingers crossed that it will give me a couple of years of flawless use.***Adding a comment - If I am not mistaken, I remember seeing that Amazon suspended the sale of this device for a short time some months back.  I can't remember the exact wording Amazon used, but I think it had to do with the device having an issue that Amazon was addressing before putting it back on the website for sale.  That being said, I am wondering, when I see that some are reporting battery issues, this was the reason. Maybe there was a batch of devices that had faulty batteries, or some other related issue.  Any device, from any manufacturer, can have issues, I think we can all agree on that. Actually, that goes for anything, even automobiles. We just always hope we get a "good" product, without defects, that will wind up being fixed one way or the other.  I really do enjoy having this tablet.  I'm looking forward to it working flawlessly for quite a while!***

Reviews.Title: decent product, a few issues.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 of these in various colors for my wife and kids. They worked well except an issue with the sd card saying it had been removed on one of them. We sent it in and got it replaced only to get 2 in a row that were dead on arrival, stuck in a boot loop that kept crashing them. Finally got all 4 stable and running now. So other than the noticable slowness compared to my quad core samsung 10.1 tablet they are happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: So far, great.
Reviews.Author: A. Brown
Reviews.Content: I've had it for several months now and it's worked flawlessly.  I keep wireless off when it's not needed and the battery last for many days - even through I'm playing angry birds, reading books, and doing other things on it.  Glad I purchased....

Reviews.Title: best of best
Reviews.Author: Edgardo Vergne
Reviews.Content: Now this tablet is great.  My 6 year old use it everyday and he downloads all the free apps you can imagine and never plays them.  As much pictures of nothing he takes and this tablet still works like new.  Speed on doing what you asked is very fast and responsive.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: It has it all. A lot less finicky connecting USB compared to some tablets. Very,very few apps are not compatible. I have a leather case which can also hold my candy bar sized Bluetooth keyboard. I can boot this and do all my banking,credit,shopping, plus an amazing amount of amusement.

Reviews.Title: I'm hooked
Reviews.Author: SG
Reviews.Content: Never had a tablet, but I thought I would purchase one for an upcoming vacation out of the US - maps, restaurant recommendation, email, etc.  The phone is just too tiny for most of that stuff unless it's an emergency, but there's lots of WI-Fi where we're going and this little ASUS will do the trick.  It's very responsive, I'm not experiencing any lag as other reviewers have reported; color and clarity is phenomenal, camera does ok (NO FLASH), and having watched many a YouTube video on a particularly lazy Sunday, it seems to me this tablet has great battery life.  I purchased a sturdy, inexpensive case (Anker) which fits the tablet perfectly; it's a must have for this tablet.  I would absolutely make this purchase again.  Very happy with this little tablet.

Reviews.Title: Parental Lock
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: PLEASE HELPCan someone tell me how to get around the Parental Lock feature when you've forgotten the pass code?

Reviews.Title: Nice Unit
Reviews.Author: ProductSleuth
Reviews.Content: I have several of these units.  All have done reasonably well.  The one failure was in the auxiliary storage stick.  Upon removal, it snapped out of the unit and apparently broke the lock for the SD stick.  As it happened, this unit could be switched to the one position that  did not need additional storage.  Note: Be extremely careful in the removal of the memory stick.  If it snaps out of the slot, it can easily eject several feet from where you are.  It could also damage the SD lock.The display is clear and readable.  Battery life is several days in standby and approximately 10 hours under normal use.  There are some free apps that help in maximizing battery life by shutting down unused applications when they are unused.  I find that I use this memo pad as often as my much more expensive iPad.I would definitely recommend the purchase of a case.

Reviews.Title: Works great for my use, which is light recreational.
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah
Reviews.Content: Touchscreen is sometimes finicky, but it may work well with a stylus. Also, very susceptible to fingerprints and streaking. Display and sound are great.

Reviews.Title: A Great Deal
Reviews.Author: MrTwistoff "hobbesclarity"
Reviews.Content: My first tablet. And I am really enjoying having this. It's small enough to slide into cargo pants pockets, and quite handy to have on travel for maintaining email/Skype calls/etc. Really happy with this purchase. Perfect size - got a padded soft case for carrying it around. I do have an issue with the microSD card disconnecting a lot, need to test against another brand. Other than that no complaints. (NOTE: the micro USB connection cannot be used for a keyboard - not supported. It only serves to connect to a PC, or for charging. Important to know.) Also this did not come with a Swype Keyboard, so I will probably by an app for it - otherwise typing emails is slow (although the predictive word generator is pretty good at learning words I use).

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for little money
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet for the price. Make sure you install the system update right after getting through the Android setup procedure or it may start coming up with exceptions. Also, the screen is not ridged like other tablets so be careful on cleaning the screen. I think I broke the screens touch sensors in my first one by pressing too hard cleaning the screen. Many people say get a screen protector for it and I think that is wise advise.Has lots of power. Lasts a long time on a battery charge.great wireless capabilities (no NFC). And get a 32 gb flash card to store your data on.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Victoria R.
Reviews.Content: I like the tablet,  it is very easy to use.  It downloads fast, I can connect to wifi in different locations and feel safe using it.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The basic functions like screen resolution and response are better than expected. The user interface is easy to use and videos play very well. I would recommend this tablet to anyone.

Reviews.Title: This is quite functional for trips when I do not wish to carry my laptop!
Reviews.Author: Doctor Anne
Reviews.Content: Pros:Cost! This is a good deal. Much less expensive than a iPAD miniGreat Kindle-substitute, in color.Small and lightweight-fits in all but the smallest of my pursesI can check my email, facebook, and weather on it.Good camera!Cons:considering the price, noneDifficult to type long messages, but that is true of any pad

Reviews.Title: Great tablet value!
Reviews.Author: Amy C.
Reviews.Content: For the money this has to be the best tablet you can buy. If you do research online it has a good reliability rating and a high battery life rating compared to other tablets. I can attest to both, and I go days without charging the battery, depending on how often I use it. Hours and hours and hours of gameplay!  Graphics are good too.  Plus it's android, so you get a lot more free apps and don't have to worry about conforming to the standards of Apple or other tablet devices.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: Kellie S. Lively
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet! Responds very well to touch and holds a charge forever! Great pic and def worth the money! Love it!

Reviews.Title: Premium isn't expensive anymore
Reviews.Author: Anonynja
Reviews.Content: Helluva capable tablet. It just does everything well! Such a pleasant surprise in technology- no nuisances to speak of. I only use it lightly, so I won't attest to its durability, but usability is simply great. Frankly, I feel spoiled for being a child of this generation, with a relatively cheap device that does.. so.. much. Movies, games, browsing, navigating, music, organizing, corresponding, pictures, you know the drill. Companies don't even bothering listing all the features and programs tablets come with, haha. My point is that this tablet handles *all* of them. The hardware is perfectly adequate; I've experienced no lag in any setting.And the size is just perfect! I love reading with it, and it's big enough to watch a movie on the bus or whatever, yet compact enough to comfortably hold in one hand and fit into any bag. 7" is such a sweet spot, though it ain't much of a drawing surface (unless you usually draw in little notepads for some reason).I just want to emphasize that i have *no complaints* with this tablet whatsoever. None. Now I'm pretty zen and not particularly picky, but seriously, nothing about the memopad annoys me. It has so far simply been a positive addition to my life. I'll end on that note :)

Reviews.Title: Carry It Everywhere!
Reviews.Author: Puff Kitty
Reviews.Content: This little ASUS MeMO is great.  The colors, the definition - fine!  The camera is good, surprise!  It is easy to use as a calendar, the Kindle android app works great on it, easier than on the paperwhite kindle (it even looks as good as the Fire to me). The speakers are tinny, but of course you can add a speaker via the USB and earphone ports.  Music sounds good enough to enjoy and audio books too.  Am not a gamer so cannot speak to that.  It is easy to navigate, which is the most important.  Bought a Roo Case for it which protects the screen since it did NOT come with a plastic screen protector like you would expect! Listen up, ASUS people!  After almost six months, my only complaint is that the battery runs down quickly, moreso than when new.  If you are on the Internet, it is sapped within a few hours.  If you are just reading, maybe it will last a day.  It now needs to be plugged in each night.  Would be interesting to know if other owners of this device are experiencing the same thing.  Over all, I am satisfied w/ the tablet and the price.

Reviews.Title: Unbeatable value and performance for an entry level "REAL" tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: Brian C.
Reviews.Content: Purchased this on sale for my eleven year old back in November 2013 for $119.xx and couldn't be happier with the purchase!  Very durable, fluid, powerful for the price, etc...  Looked at SOOOOO many tablets before making this decision.  EVERYTHING cheaper was just that...terrible screen, slow processing ability, no sd slot, on and on...  Anything that was even CLOSE the regular price of this tablet ($149.xx) couldn't match it's performance specs.  Nexus was closest and considerably more expensive.  Samsung Tab 3 was decently more expensive but couldn't touch the power of this tab in direct side-by-side comparison at local stores.Again, very pleased!!!  So much, in fact, that Santa brought his nine year old sister one for X-mas and, of course, she loves it too!!!

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: wanda ingram
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and the Asus had good reviews so I bought it. For the $150 price its a pretty good tablet. The only complaint I have is it doesnt take great pictures on the inside but very good pictures on the outside. The body is very durable and not cheap looking. I wish the volume was a little louder for Pandora but I guess I need a stereo if I want loud music..Im satisfied with my purchse!

Reviews.Title: So far so good... Edited 4/29/2013--UGH
Reviews.Author: Mama of 4
Reviews.Content: ***Edited 4/29/14: Well, I had a feeling this would happen. We now are sending out the second tablet we purchased. The keypad function suddenly stopped working. These tablets are well taken care of. They are screen and tablet protected completely and my sons are monitored in their usage of them. I am beside myself that both of these tablets after only four months of usage needed to be serviced already. That is absurd. I have a feeling this will be happening again. I'm happy that the company is willing to fix the issue, but to have to pay to ship to them, then my sons losing all of their info and games and such, it's just quite a pain to deal with this. Why can't they just work properly? I find it hard to believe that these are solid, well built tablets when in purchasing two of them, I've already needed them BOTH serviced after such a short period of use. I'm staring to believe they are junk tablets. Yea, the price wasn't $300 but we did pay $129 for each tablet and for a family on a budget, that isn't cheap to us! I expected more out of these and am feeling let down by the whole brand itself. Such a bummer. :/My advice is that if you have ANY issue that cannot be resolved, contact the company through a live chat. They will work with you on what is the problem and will need all of your info on the tablet itself. They then create an RMA for you to fill out and send with the tablet to Texas for servicing. You have to pay the shipping, but they pay for it on the way back to you. Anyway, good luck to those that own this! Another two cents...if you're considering these tablets...don't!Bought two of these for Christmas as a gift to each of my sons, who at the time were 6 and 7. One of them suddenly stopped working recently and we contacted the company directly, in which we live chatted with someone on the issue. After trouble shooting some things, we realized we weren't getting anywhere and the company then sent us a form through an email so we could pack up the tablet and send it to them so it could be checked and fixed if possible. Within two weeks we got the tablet back, just like new. We lost everything as far as what was downloaded game wise (as that's all they play on their tablets) but we expected that and it was not a problem whatsoever as all the games were just free downloads. We had to pay nothing (except shipping TO them, which I was fine with because we just wanted the problem resolved) and had the tablet back so fast that it was just a very simple process overall. With that, I am very satisfied. The company came through on that retrospect fully.The only issue I have is that they never said what the problem was directly, and that is something I would have liked to have known. I don't understand why that is, but I think they could have least told us what was wrong and possibly why. But we got it back fixed and I'm happy with that. So far, so good. We'll see how these hold up in the future. At least I know I can turn to the company for help when needed as they did come through the first time around. I fully back up going through them if you didn't purchase a warranty through Amazon, and especially if you are after the time frame through Amazon as well. Do not go through what's listed in your booklets...I had to google the company and choose United States to get with someone here. They are located in Texas. Any issues, I highly recommend that you try the company first and foremost.

Reviews.Title: I love this thing!
Reviews.Author: Kelsey
Reviews.Content: It replaced my old laptop. It's so lightweight and cute. Plus it's super fast and it's the perfect size for reading, playing games, web surfing, etc.

Reviews.Title: Top Notch Pad for basic function
Reviews.Author: Dan J. McClellan
Reviews.Content: Responsive, charge lasts good.  Perfect for multifunction tab - toddler education, social media, news, any other apps.  Very high quality device - especially for low price.

Reviews.Title: Asus 7 HD.
Reviews.Author: Jack Caldicott
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with it. Works great with a lot of useful built in applications. Exceeded my expectations.Really great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: R. Marcela
Reviews.Content: Practical, eficient, great price, great size. It was a gift for the kid and he loves it. Battery life es exceptional and the processor takes all the gaming he does great. Is also great for reading books and watching movies because of the hd screen!

Reviews.Title: Great buy as good or better than a name brand tablet.
Reviews.Author: Bahamut
Reviews.Content: Great buy girl friend literally will not put it down.  She watches movies, plays games, email the whole 9 yards, plus it takes excellent pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for my household
Reviews.Author: Kevin Fitzpatrick
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these tablets for a 5 and 7 year old for Christmas. I received the nexus 7 for me. The nexus and memopad have identical chargers and cables. These tablets have performed great for my kids. I did all the updates immediately before my kids first used them which I think is important. Now for the only problem, and its kind of big, but I can work with it. My daughters tablet would not charge nor come on. I opened the case which was very easy using a plastic triangle shaped tool that looks kinda like a guitar pick. I checked the battery voltage which was 3.1v. Too low to start charging. I disconnected it and reconnected it a few times and got it charging again. I gave it back to her with a full battery. The same problem happened again. I took her cable and connected it to my sons tablet over night. His tablet then would not turn on. Opened it up and battery was at 3.2v. Anyway, after testing everything I found the cable to be faulty and caused the battery to drain. Google "micro usb cable drain/wake problem". I purchased a mediabridge charge cable and all is well again. The only way I found to get the tablet to wake again was to disconnect the battery. Luckily it only takes 30 seconds to open the case. If you have any questions feel free to ask. Overall the tablet is awesome.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMOPad
Reviews.Author: Simone Houle
Reviews.Content: After 3 months of using the MeMOPad to play a game, it suddenly died on me for no apparent reason. Until this happened, It was the best tablet on which to play games. However, Amazon made it right by refunding my money. I am going to order another tablet and hopefully this one will last longer.

Reviews.Title: Good investmenT
Reviews.Author: Andrew Yoo
Reviews.Content: I like this product for the fact its easier to use than a ipad, I gave it a 5 star rating because it does what I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Austin Wrenn
Reviews.Content: After 3 weeks I have had no problems and enjoy the Tablet. I took it with me on a trip to the UK to take pictures and the camera could have been better, but overall it worked fine.

Reviews.Title: memo pad
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: my son loves this to play games.  It's good enough for the price for a kid to keep busy when in need.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!! Worth every penny!!!
Reviews.Author: T. Brown
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet for myself a few days after Christmas,I read tons of the reviews about it prior to order it from another site. The 16GB of internal memory is 11GBs of usable memory,which is very fine for me since I use a 64GB microSD card with the tablet,plan to upgrade to a 128GB microSD too in the future for it. The screen is a finger print magnet,but a good screen protector does the trick to help with this,and a microfiber cloth too. The battery lasts for about 12 hours on wifi and with videos,I've played a few high resolution games on the tablet till it died,and I can confirm it'll last a long time. I use the tablet for viewing 720P movies and videos using a MX player app,plays majority of the videos I throw onto it very well. I also use it to play wifi games too. Note that in order to get the full 12 hours of wifi and videos from it,the screen must be on the lowest setting.Prior to owning this tablet,I had a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0,which was a fine tablet while I used it,but this one is a great upgrade with the better CPU,memory and screen. This memopad may not have a high scratch resistant screen like the Tab did,but it does its job well.I just hope that I don't run into any of the similar issues that others have had with theirs dying in a few months. If it lasts for a year,then I'll update this review.Edit: Forgot to note that my memopad is rooted and using the SuperDragon custom ROM from the XDA forum and the tablet runs buttery smooth with no lag.Update: 6/2/2014Had mine for 6 months so far and in perfect condition still and no problems whatsoever with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Bought for a Kid--It's Been Great
Reviews.Author: D. K. Watkins "Amateur Everythinger"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a child's gift based on the recommendation of a consumer affairs reporter, adn I haven't been dissapointed.  Easy to use and decent battery life.

Reviews.Author: gloria henry
Reviews.Content: I like this product. this ASUS MeMoPad allowes me to use it anywhere  in my house.I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I love my blue asus memo pad HD-7!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mr Royal
Reviews.Content: I have owned my Asus memo pad HD-7 for about two and a half months now. I haven't had any problems with it whatsoever. It doesn't have the most sensitive touch screen out on the market and every now and then I will have to double or triple tap on something to open it. The HD display is quite simply beautiful when watching videos or viewing pictures. Also the sound is not too shabby either, it actually sounds as good if not better than my first gen Asus Nexus 7. All said and done, in my humble opinion, if you are in the market for an excellent low budget tablet this is the one for you!!

Reviews.Title: Needs Firmware Patch--Can't play popular video apps
Reviews.Author: Thaddius Mumford "Shop Saver"
Reviews.Content: I would have given this tablet at least 4 stars had the firmware been more stable and able to run some of the more popular apps that I enjoy using including Sony Entertainment's Crackle app and Xfinity's TV Go app.  Both of the apps won't work in Asus MeMO Pad HD 7 because of a firmware problem reading the video codecs.  The same apps work perfect in my LG Viper 4G LTE smartphone when connected to data or wifi.  I have asked Asus to fix the problem.  They are workiing on a fix but I am doubful how responsive they will be to actually distribute a firmware patch very soon.  I will add an update to this product review if the come through and provide a fix.  In the meantime, I do not recommend this tablet.  I suggest to anyone who buys a tablet to test it first to make sure it will play popular apps.  I use my tablet for its reading apps and I want to enjoy the video apps, so for me this tablet is practically useless.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Fatima M.
Reviews.Content: I recomended it so much! It is cheap. The battery works great. It isn't slow at all. You can install many applications. Lovely to read it. You can even install FIFA 14. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: This is a great little table for the money.  I got this for my 9 year old son for Christmas and he uses it all the time for internet searches, watching videos, playing games, etc.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet for the Money
Reviews.Author: Science Guy "MP"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is fantastic.  Great battery life, clear screen, no lockups.  It is Android based but very well made.  Don't waste your money on a cheap no name tablet.  This will serve you well.

Reviews.Title: It wouldn't turn on!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: ppsker
Reviews.Content: WE have had this little beauty since Christmas past. Not a single problemplaying games, watching Netflix, Amazon prime, Google browsing, and taking pictures! We have loaded it up with every app and social network. We use messaging,e-mail and now video chat! How much fun can two seniors have, until..... it didn't turn on �. Oh my, now what? I'll just plug itinto the back of the computer and kick start it, nope nada, not gonna happen.So went to Asus and sent my repair ticket to them. they are supposed torespond in 24 hrs. I couldn't wait, went on line and read horror stories aboutour beauty. Until a little gal reported," hold down the on button for 60 secondsor more, It'll turn on." By gosh she was right!!!! We are back to it again andhaving fun!  Asus memo pad HD 7 is a Beauty.....�

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Thomas Hottle "Floydian Slip"
Reviews.Content: Just the right form factor. Memory is plentiful, and it works beautifully on most Wi-Fi. Downsides: Sometimes touch screen is not as sensitive as I'd like, and occasionally it needs a restart for some unknown reason. Only happens once every few days. Great device for watching video!

Reviews.Title: Not a bad tablet but not a great one either.
Reviews.Author: greg
Reviews.Content: SD card in terrible place constantly telling me SD card removed when it's locked in place, hard to type on. Support so so can't download anything to SD card. Camera good battery life good freezes sometimes,picture good, no HDMI slot I've had mine about six months getting a bigger tablet with more features.

Reviews.Title: like it!
Reviews.Author: joey
Reviews.Content: Good android device.  16 gig hard drive is plenty spacious.  Glad 2 c Intel getting more involved in tablet 2.

Reviews.Title: Great product but screen stopped working after 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Carlos Garcia
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great I bought as a birthday gift for my daughter and it worked flawlessly for about 2 weeks then the bottom portion of the screen stop working rendering the device pretty much useless which is why I'm giving a 3 star review. I knew that the product was not brand new when I bought it but I have never had any issues with refurbished or used items from Amazon up until now. I'm in the process of return it and getting a refund, I went ahead and bought the same one again only this time new.

Reviews.Title: Not a deal breaker
Reviews.Author: Michael C.
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these. The one I gave my wife, I placed a 16 gb micro sd card into and loaded some books to it. As she was using the internet, the sd card would start to say its being mounted and then she would get messages, telling her the card was not properly removed, thinking it was the card I swapped her card for mine. My tablet has been working fine with either card, days on end. So as a word of warning make sure you test that out, Amazon will be replacing the defective one. Otherwise these things are great little things if your not doing too much on them the 1gb ram is a bit limiting.One last thing make sure you get a screen protector right away, I chose the matte finish and it really really makes a difference you can use them outdoors. and fosmon(a bit slow on the shipping) have stiff plastic ones now that are easy to apply. I got a 3 pack and it seems I made the right derision.

Reviews.Title: Good value for price
Reviews.Author: M. Ondich "MelLO"
Reviews.Content: I bought two; one for my daughter, and one for me.  I think she's permanently attached to it.  She has been playing The Sims a lot, as well as other games and has not complained of any issues.  Battery life is amazingly long for what I've seen in tablets.  I don't use mine a lot and will last several days while turned on, but locked. I was surprised to pick it up almost two weeks later and still have 30% battery left.My daughter charges hers every night, but it lasts several hours on weekends when she is off and on all day.  YouTube, Netflix, etc looks good.  The screen is crisp and clear.  Typical Android device, but I do miss the Swype technology my Samsung phone has.The screen does seem to have a little tiny lag or delayed reaction.  I'm used to my Galaxy S4 which just does things immediately when touched, this I have to pause for a split second on each touch to get it to register.  Irritating when you're highly impatient like I am.  And there seems to be some weird error that happens, if I back out of a screen I seem to get stuck in a loop of an error stating something has stopped.  It doesn't happen all the time, and I find if I just hit the home screen then run a task kill it doesn't happen.  But so far my only complaints.

Reviews.Title: Nice buy!
Reviews.Author: tyler
Reviews.Content: I've had this only for a day so I may change my mind later but so far so good. I had to download an app to play movies, I feel this should already be on the tablet. I like that it's easy enough for a two year old to use, even though the screen is a bit smaller than expected (might be an issue). Still checking it out though.

Reviews.Title: Nice handy tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Manternach
Reviews.Content: I got the Asus MemoPad for the kids for Christmas.  It has been a good product.  The only issue is battery life, and it is very slow to come on (one might have to hold the on button for more than 10 seconds for a power up).  It does not have a swype capable keyboard installed which is annoying once you come to expect it in a device.  Otherwise, it is fast, perfectly sized, and fun to use.

Reviews.Title: Nexus at an inexpensive price?
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My friend has a Nexus and I researched information noting that Asus is a manufacturer of that tablet, so I took a chance at this more generic one. (I am NOT a technologically savvy person.) Being the owner of a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2, as well as having messed around with my friend's tablets from other brands, is the only credibility I have when I say that this tablet is amazing. For a prices that is less expensive than a Galaxy, I get great camera shots (Galaxy disappointed me with this when I first owned one) with what is apparently 5 MP (although the front-facing camera is only 1.5 MP), and the speed of this tablet is impressive. Also, I do not have to worry much about the battery life. Those who own a Galaxy will know that at some point throughout an eight-hour day a worry will sink in about whether or not to plug in our tablet. This (Asus) tablet actually makes me feel secure not only about not plugging in the battery, but about not having to wait long for it to recharge once it does require to be plugged-in to an outlet. Wow. The battery (again, not a technologically savvy person) charges quickly and lasts probably more than the 10 hours noted on the product description. I am noticing that I can go on and on about this product, so I will only say this: buy it. It made me happy and will likely make others like me happy as well. (Note: I was worried about reviews concerning glitches on this device. After a week of ownership, I think I know what that is about. It is not that this device has glitches, but that it is very rigid in the way its features function. For example, I have noticed that I have to reopen my setting app if I choose to unpair a device through a bluetooth connection. However, for the price and great features that come with that price, one can easily adapt to this extra step in the process.)Thanks Asus!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: ananthalakshmi
Reviews.Content: Good for through price I guessGiving lite troubleStill getting good in a whileI am OK with the product.

Reviews.Title: Extremely satisfied
Reviews.Author: JON E SHORT
Reviews.Content: We bought this tablet for our 6 year old daughter. It is perfect for her! The Play Store is exactly like the Play Store on the Android phones which is perfect bc she was able to download all of the apps she was already familiar with from my phone. Camera takes great pics! This is an exceptional tablet at a low cost.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, great price
Reviews.Author: collegekidd16
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great. Picture is great, camera is great, love that you can expand the storage, very few glitches, and a great size. Sound could be louder and the back gets scratched quickly, so make sure you buy a case.

Reviews.Title: Sokid tsblet for 150$
Reviews.Author: Valeren
Reviews.Content: I have had product for 3 weeks, although I did not purchase on amazon i did get a (returned) pad from the store. In simple words the tablet is exactly what i needed. I have a tf300t and its has worked very well with minmal issues for 2 years and the memo hd was its perfect companion.  The main pupose of the tablet was for flying and being able to look at approach plates and maps. However because of screen resolution and overall solid performance of tablet ill probably use it for more. The gps works very well even at 27k feet. I would recommend to others but looking at other reviews the warranty might be a good option.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Mid-Priced Tablet
Reviews.Author: Al G
Reviews.Content: Great bang for the buck!  I wanted a capable tablet with good specs that would serve my needs.  This tablet has a lot of higher priced features in a Mid-price range.  It has a Quad Core 1.2 GHz processor, 16 GB Flash Memory, 1 GB RAM Memory with a 10-hour battery life.  It also has a 5MP rear camera and a 1.2 MP front.  A lot tablets don't have any rear facing camera at all, especially within this price range!  It has built in WIFI which means you can connect to WIFI when available and then don't have the ongoing charges from a wireless carrier to deal with. The screen is also a respectable 1280 x 800 resolution which means the colors will pop and you don't go blind trying to read anything with it, especially a book.It's updates have been to Android Jelly Bean 4.2.2.  Hopeful Asus will make available and release updates to Android 4.4.2 soon.  An entry level tablet can leave you wanting more and a premium price of $400 will make you poor but this tablet is respectable for all but the super power user.  It's 16GB memory is fairly large but if you need more it can be expanded with a SD memory card for massive music or pictures storage.  And with Cloud Storages available you may prefer to use that for access from multiple devices.  With access to "Google Play" you can have hundreds of thousands of free apps to choose from and make your tablet do what ever you like.  Can't go wrong with this tablet, a great value from a respected manufacturer!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: Vinny
Reviews.Content: I received this tablet for Christmas 2013, and I absolutely love it every single day. Connection to WiFi networks in terms of bandwidth effectively doubled from what my phone can do. Handles Madden 25 Mobile without any lag at all (To give you an idea of what this tablet can do in terms of gaming), and has an absolutely beautiful display! I use it for everything, work, play, study, and it has yet to give me any problems!!! The only way for you to truly understand what I am saying...buy one! :)

Reviews.Title: My wife love this tablet !
Reviews.Author: JFD
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet, as a gift for my wife. She loves it!It was acquired in the black Friday at an excellent price for the quality of the product.Very good definition of screen and excellent performance for the price.I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: G. Keenan
Reviews.Content: This tablet is excellent, although I cannot compare it to any other tablets as it is my first, I found the screen  quality excellent for watching downloaded tv shows, much better than I expected. WiFi seems to perform as good if not better than any of my other expensive devices (laptops, desktops). Its a very entertaining device for the money. I am now a tablet convert.

Reviews.Title: No way to beat this tablet in 7HD format
Reviews.Author: sidney saxon
Reviews.Content: I have ordered 5 of these tablets, 2 for me and my wife. The grand boys came over before Christmas and played around with it and was hooked. So their mother had me order 3 more, 2 for boys and 1 for my granddaughter. They have been rough on theirs and it still held up under those VERY ROUGH BOYS. Mine, I use all day every day.Great product and I ordered 2 other tablets before sending them back because there was bugs and really slow, to operate and the WLAN device was very slow. Hope this helps someone to decide.

Reviews.Title: my new magic portable friend !!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lynn Mckee
Reviews.Content: luv my new tablet. simple and uncluttered. i have an old computer and now I know I will be ok because I have a great back up plan! thanks lynn.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Douglas L. Cabana
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 7-year-old daughter.  I was a little hesitant; she did well with using my iPad but would delete programs or have issues playing her games so I was worried she is have issues with an Android device.  This has been great for her, she maneuvers through it without any issues, and the tablet works great.

Reviews.Title: great tablet under $150
Reviews.Author: jose sarabia
Reviews.Content: even if you buy it new its best if you give it a hard reset, if you don't the tablet seems to try to open all the apps at once and causes it to crash form time to time, make sure you have the tasks manager in the floating tabs to clear out all the task it may open without your knowlege

Reviews.Title: Great for School
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for my girlfriend and we both love it. We love it so much i decide to buy myself the same version of this one. Great for Schooling, leisure, and business.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMoPad
Reviews.Author: Bruce Kalashian Auto Spec
Reviews.Content: I really anjoy it!  It has many good APS and it runs all the APS I put in.  The GPS is why I replaced my old one.  I put in Google Sky Map and it is soooo cool.  I always wanted to star gaze but the old charts make it very hard to know what you're looking at.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet
Reviews.Author: Dan Schmitt
Reviews.Content: I was dead set on getting a Galaxy Tab 3, until I came across this. My review is simple: the features offered for the price it's offered at...nothing compares. Worth ever cent and more.Although I was a diehard Samsung guy, I bought this and also bought an Asus G750JX-DB71 gaming laptop. In my opinion, Asus is a contender for some of the best stuff on the market today.

Reviews.Title: Not Just for Children and Teenagers
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Writer"
Reviews.Content: I am not a tech wiz in the least, yet I desired to own a tablet to use away from my desk for writing, internet activities, and inline videos. I use it for other things as well. It works great for what I need to do. It has been reviewed as a great entry tablet for children and teens, yet it works for adults as well who may not have a lot of money and aren't trying to play games. It comes with 16GB of storage space and a micro USB port to add additional storage. Sometimes I have to press twice to activate an app, yet it could be me since I have to do the same thing with other devices (remember, I'm not tech savvy). I am quite pleased with my tablet. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Best Entry Tablet
Reviews.Author: Steven L. Bledsoe "RC Jet Freak"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before picking up 2 of these. I was getting tablets for my 9yo twins, so I was looking at price, durability, and something that they could grow with. I didn't want to by some child specific built tablet which some were even higher priced than the ASUS or the cheaper ones that didn't get very good reviews. In my weeks of research it became evident that the best bang for the buck for this size entry level tablet was between this and the Nexus 7. Both have their pros and cons but they are pretty close in comparison. Everything will tell you the Nexus 7(newer model) is best but it will cost you more too. They said the new ASUS MEMO HD was closely designed to the previous Nexus 7. For me it was not worth the price difference since this was going to be for my kids first tablets. These also had the sd card expansion the Nexus does not. We have had these for about a month and they are used non-stop by my boys. If you are used to using and android based smart phones you will have a easy learning curve in setting up and using these tablets. It runs fast. We have had no issues with internet or running games. My boys run Netflix constantly and there has been no lag. This also has a front and rear camera with decent quality. I set them up with Skype accounts so they can video chat with the grandparents anytime they want. Looked good on our end and my parents said the picture on their end was good too. I find myself grabbing their tablets a lot to use vs. my laptop or cell phone now. I think the viewer angles are good. The only "con" I can see as noted by others is this unit does show finger prints easily. But that is only a issue depending on how the light hits it and come on, how hard is it to just wipe it off. They do sell screen protectors for this that helps with this issue, but honestly ours is in a case and I always tell the boys to wash there hands before they use them. Battery life is really good. My boys can use them almost non-stop playing games, streaming movies, internet, etc. and it would be at 20-30% battery life. This has parent control features but I have not set them up. This is a good entry level tablet and perfect size for portability. Will fit in your purse with a case easily ladies. We bought the Procase ASUS MeMO Pad HD Protective case here on Amazon which fit perfect and are very durable( Also come with free stylus). If you been looking at this tablet or want a good entry level tablet this is it. I honestly don't know why anyone would need to spend 300+ for a tablet. If your one of those people who can do everything from their phone but just would like to have a bigger screen to look at then this is your answer. Were happy, and we got 2 for less than 1 in the higher end models. This is perfect for those of us on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Eric H
Reviews.Content: Awesome Tablet for the money. Bought it as a gift for my mother after almost pulling the trigger on the slightly more expensive Nexus 7 (2013). Saved a bit of money on this and it's absolutely perfect for her needs. Great size/weight, good screen, and works flawlessly so far. Highly recommended if you're in the market for a 7inch tablet.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: the kids love these tablets they work great and are way better then the last ones we got them these things are fast and work great no issues yet.

Reviews.Title: More than expected
Reviews.Author: Carolyn P. Woods
Reviews.Content: I have found this to be satisfactory in every way.  I selected this particular one based on other reviews from customers.

Reviews.Title: It worked great for 6 weeks
Reviews.Author: Kimberly74
Reviews.Content: This seems like a great little tablet for the money while it works. It was purchased as a Christmas present for my son in an effort to wrestle back control of my iPad. Unfortunately for me most of his favorite toddler apps (Endless ABCs and a few others) were not available on this version and he still preferred mine. While it worked I thought it was user friendly and pretty intuitive. It received fairly light use for 4-6 weeks and then suddenly went to sleep and will now no longer turn on. The battery was fully charged at the time and additional charging does not help. I purchased an additional warranty, but it looks like I may have to contact the manufacturer according to other reviews. Had I known this would happen I probably would have held off buying a tablet or purchased an iPad mini.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: Got this for Christmas and it has been performing great so far.  Battery last a long time, apps load quick, lots of power for a low price (caught mine for $120), well worth the price I paid for a mid-tier tablet to mess around with.

Reviews.Title: I like this tablet
Reviews.Author: Ronny B.
Reviews.Content: It is much faster than my 8 inch tablet I have from Vizio, but I think it is only a single core processor where this one is a quad-core.  I bought a winshield mount for it and I use it with Co-Pilot for my GPS and for playing my MP3s, at the same time.  I have 1995 Pontaic Trans Am that has a OEM cassette player, but with and Aux Jack added so this plugs right into it with an double 1/8" stereo phone jack.  I also use it to play games and view pictures and videos from my Canon camera.BTW the mount I bought was from Amazon also the "Jarv High Grade Windshield Swivel Suction Car Mount for Google Nexus 7 / Apple Ipad Mini, Ipad Mini 2 / Galaxy Tab 2 , Tab 3 and All 7 Inch Tablets" and it works get with this tablet for me.

Reviews.Title: ASUS  Memo Pad HD 7 in.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love it. I researched tablets for about 2 weeks then decided on this one. 16 GB Quadcore. I got the 7 inch one for the convenience of mobility ( it fits in cargo pants pocket,and in my inside jacket pockets). I have talked others into getting one also. This I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I'd buy it again
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Great device, runs smoothly, and handles what I need for personal or business use. Great battery life and great screen resolution.  Really needed a matte finish screen protector and is sadly a very skinny tablet compared to other 7" tablets. Super buy for the price!!!!

Reviews.Title: Surprising!
Reviews.Author: Billo
Reviews.Content: It was indeed surprising. My wife has wanted a small tablet for over a year so we followed the recommendation of a friend. We studied the reviews and this model scored higher than most. It was a good fit for her needs. She uses it for her email, some web browsing and viewing movies and videos anywhere in the house. She's extremely pleased. Color is great, sound is more than adequate and battery life is good. She's recommended it to three of her friends and one has already purchased one. Wish it came with some cheapo basic case but for the price it was a real bargain. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Glendon K. Blake
Reviews.Content: Best gift i ever received save time when looking up stuff online and i can take it anywhere WiFi is available

Reviews.Title: Great Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Billy Boy
Reviews.Content: I had bought an Allwinner tablet about a year ago for about the same price as I paid for this ASUS. What an improvement in speed and functionality. I haven't had any apps that have not worked. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Lydia Johnson "Say something about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy! Sometimes I am not sure about buying electronics online. In this case it was worth it.

Reviews.Title: Value for money tablet
Reviews.Author: Ng Chong Wee
Reviews.Content: A value for money piece of tablet made by ASUS. The tablet was very well-built and apps run smoothly on it. A recommended buy for budget users.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: busy_shopper
Reviews.Content: Considering its a lower priced product compared to other 7" tablets it is a good buy. Apps tend to just close for no apparent reason, and overall a bit slow. Still meets my needs and glad I didn't pay $400 or more considering I mostly use it for Kindle and for my 6 year old to play on.

Reviews.Title: great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Corey Gibbard
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about this tablet. The functionality is great, and it has the SD card slot that is misreading on both the Kindle Fire and the Nexus 7. I would absolutely recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Best value for the price
Reviews.Author: fabito
Reviews.Content: awesome piece of equipment. Beautiful. Runs very good w/ all apps i have installed on it. Screen resolution is great.

Reviews.Title: Love - hate relationship
Reviews.Author: Jerry W. Hillius "Sentimental grandpa"
Reviews.Content: My wife got a new Asus MemoPad HD at the first of the year on a $129 special at Office Depot.  It has been a great tablet until 3 weeks later and it won't turn on after a night of be charged.  Went to the bogs and tried "holding the power button for 30 sec", tried holding down the "power and volume keys together", tried a "trickle charge from my laptop".  Nothing works.Looks like a trip to Office Depot for an exchange....maybe an upgrade. Bottomline:  If you can get it to turn-on, it is a great little tablet.

Reviews.Title: easy choice
Reviews.Author: X2 user
Reviews.Content: Battery life on this thing is incredible.  Don't cheap out on the $80 ones but don't sell out on the iPads.  Sound, resolution, speed, and battery exceeds expectations.  I'm glad I returned the dragon touch for this.

Reviews.Title: Great Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Caitlin Anderson
Reviews.Content: I researched long and hard on for a good tablet for everyday use. I have an Asus Computer with a touch screen and I thought the tablet verison would be great. Turns out I love this tablet!I recommend this to anyone who is going to school or needs it for everyday use!

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Fantastic tablet for the price...has very nice battery life and runs very smoothly which was my main concern in buying a tablet.....Love it so much!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Rebekah
Reviews.Content: I haven't found anything yet that i dont like about this.  I bought it for my husband, and it even has some things i can do on my ipad! We really like it and its a great size.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Prazdncer
Reviews.Content: I love the it.... far better than I expected.  It is the perfect size and easy to carry through out my busy day.

Reviews.Title: Slowly died but great while it lasted
Reviews.Author: K. S. Laughey
Reviews.Content: Something was wrong from the moment we opened it. The battery never lasted long and eventually it stopped charging and then switched off forever after 12 days.While it lasted my son loved it - hassled me until I filled it full of games, discovered BBC iPlayer and could email and skype the family from the other side of the room just like a real grown up.ASUS however don't have a worldwide warranty service unlike most manufacturers so I will not be buying another thing made by ASUS again as a result.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: Riyuki
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a tablet for several months, as I wanted to give the idea to my wife as a Christmas present.  When I read the specs on this tablet, it seemed almost too good to be true.I recieved the tablet as a present, and here are my impressions.The tablet is very well built.  It has a nice heft to it, but is not too heavy.  The only complaint I have with the tablet is the screen.  It is a hard plastic rather than the "GorillaGlass" that I have seen some of the more expensive tablets advertising.  However, I have not had any issues with the screen.The sensitivity of the screen is excellent, although it doesn't seem to like styluses nearly as much as it likes fingers.  I also purchased a Cross Tech2 pen/stylus combo, and the stylus functionality is hit/miss probably 30% of the time.  This happens with a Targus stylus as well, so I don't think it is limited to the Cross pen.The tablet is POWERFUL.  I was shocked to find a tablet with a quad-core processor, 16gb of built in memory, AND a microSD card slot for under $250.  I was even happier to find one for under $150!  I have tried quite a few games on this tablet, and although I am not truly a tablet gamer (I stick to slot games and the occasional Candy Crush Saga), it has performed admirably.  I am however, working on my tablet on a very regular basis (daily).  The tablet is unbelievably nice to carry to jobsites.I had no troubles updating this tablet, although I purchased a white one for my wife, and she encountered an issue with a firmware update that improved the performance of NetFlix.  She is not too worried about it, as she does not watch netflix on the device.  Installation of apps, including the Amazon Appstore was painless.I have installed a 32gb microSD card, and have loaded several digital movies onto the system.  Playback is gorgeous in HD, although the sound only comes from one side when one is holding the tablet in a landscape orientation.  My suggestion, get a nice set of earbuds.All in all, an insanely featured tablet for an unbelievable price.  I have recommended this tablet to QUITE a few friends, and so far, none have been unhappy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet, works great
Reviews.Author: Anson M.
Reviews.Content: Great screen Quality, functions smoothly without any hangups, good solid build quality to it. A great buy, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!
Reviews.Author: Z. K. Goulamgookhan
Reviews.Content: I was very much surprised when I received it. I was expecting a much lower quality for that price.Pros:The finish is really nice - no sharp edges. The high gloss back finish looks awesome (although a little too glossy for my taste).I was very impressed with its battery life. I don't have a hi-end tablet to compare with. But for this price range, I think this is one of the best.I didn't get any wireless connectivity issues so far. In fact, it works flawlessly and quite fast up to now.The camera works fine and can take average to good quality pictures in daylight or fully lit environment.Power and volume buttons are activated with right amount of pressure.I had the impression that a 7-inch tablet would be too small for me, but it just doesn't feel that way when holding and using it.The Asus apps are actually very useful.I've already installed like 20 apps and they all work perfectly without any issues.Cons:Glossy back is prone to smudgeSome lags when swiping through screens and screen rotationsCamera could be betterI don't know if this will be the case in the future, but I wish it gets updated to android 4.3I'd definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a tablet for this price range.

Reviews.Title: Good quality midrange tablet
Reviews.Author: Busy mom
Reviews.Content: No troubles so far with this tablet. Everything about it is mid-range. The battery life is good. It plays HD movies fine. It is built nicely.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my tablet!
Reviews.Author: Gracie Totman
Reviews.Content: This reader is a good value. It does everything one might want in tablet. However the on/off button is very finicky.

Reviews.Title: The best gift i ever got
Reviews.Author: lordson
Reviews.Content: I bought this as my christmas present and its the best christmas present and my best companion i mean there is nothing i cant do with it. It is a great deal for the money

Reviews.Title: Bought several
Reviews.Author: Mike Brooks "Tech & Media Enthusiast"
