Reviews.Content: They are good tablets for the price.  They are not an iPad replacement. They aren't even a Kindle replacement.  However, if you want to get your child one, these are perfect for that. They are also perfect for running non-taxing apps. I believe you have to update the software to be able to run nextflix too. At least I had to do so.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with this tablet.  Great price.
Reviews.Author: Wyoming Eagle
Reviews.Content: I had never owned or used a tablet before.  I only needed it for a few things due to the wireless capability, so I did not want to spend a great deal.  This tablet was the best price I found for the overall quality and features.  The screen display is very good.  The solidness, which was mentioned in some reviews as not as good as ipads, seems quite good to me.  I didn't use the tablet before I put a screen cover on it, so I don't have a response about the fingerprint issue mentioned.  I've had it for about a month and am glad I bought it.  I didn't give it five stars because I have yet to "love" an electronic device.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Rob Romero "texas4rob"
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great tablet at a great price. The Cameras work great as this was one of the reasons that I purchased it.( 2 cameras ). It has no problems running any games and it keeps my kids off of my tablet! They were always on mine since I bought them a low budget tablet last year. Never again!! I also have other Asus tablets in the house that work great

Reviews.Title: a great value for the price
Reviews.Author: D. MacQueen "Dave M."
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife to replace her first edition  ipad. she was delighted with the performance and ease of use. She particularly enjoyed the voice activated browser search , which retrieved what she was looking for every time. We have had the tablet for two months now and, so far, no problems.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet.
Reviews.Author: Colin "cwood5"
Reviews.Content: Very fast and responsive.  For the price it is as good as any mid level tablet.  Plus it has a nice camera on both the front and back.

Reviews.Title: Asus MeMOPad HD 7-inch
Reviews.Author: Dale Rose
Reviews.Content: Yes did very well. But still does not have gaming attachments like the Nexus, so my son still takes my Nexus and is not charged when I need it.

Reviews.Title: Had to reset the device one already
Reviews.Author: Mainsil
Reviews.Content: Nice tablet, I would give it five stars but it had a pretty big problem.  My son had this for a month and it suddenly stopped communicating with the internet, even though Wifi Connection was solid, and it was cleared through the router.  Tried the on-off, off battery out, reset the WiFi, went through all the configuration settings, etc.Finally gave up and reset the machine back to factory settings.  I was able to get it connected to the internet again, but my son had to re-download all his apps.

Reviews.Title: great buy at a great price
Reviews.Author: cubao boy
Reviews.Content: Consumer's report recommended this model. so far so good. can stand toe-to-toe with galaxy tab 3. what's more, it has 16 gb - double that of other competing brands.

Reviews.Title: Our Grandson LOVES this!
Reviews.Author: C. L. Hornung "new grandma"
Reviews.Content: We bought this for a Christmas gift for our 10-year old grandson (it was on his Santa list). He jumped so high when he opened it and I am sure that he loves his tablet!  This is enough storage for a kid and has many apps on it!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet and my son loves it on all hockey road trips!
Reviews.Author: Robert Whited
Reviews.Content: Does everything a young boy  would want.  Great peace of mind as its cost was low, but quality is great.

Reviews.Title: great asus tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: at this price, you cannot go wrong.its fast and responsive.smoothe to the touch. don't wait and go buy now! thank you

Reviews.Title: We love Asus !
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: Best tablets on the market. No sense spending more and getting less! These tablets work great and are well built.

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7's Sister Is Ok
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I thought I would write a review to get an answer to a question.Bought two of these tablets for my kids.I ordered navy for my son which looked more like black than navy.Pink for my daughter was nice.I don't have any problems with the plastic back cover.The pink looks much better than the navy.And I chose the colors not because of what one reviewer said about the concept of why they came out with these colors ie, green is environmental etc.My kids favorite colors are pink and blue that's why I bought these colors.I won't add anymore to this except to ask "Where are the games?"Kids have ipod 4 and it was easy to install anything from games, tv channels like Disney.And everytime, you have to sign in for every single thing.It's so annoying and frustrating!Glad I didn't buy the Nexus 7 for myself even if it has more than a thousand reviews.I bought the Samsung Tab 8 and am very happy with it.With all the reviews the Nexus 7 has gotten I am sure I would have trouble with it just like this Asus tablet.Samsung tab is easy to use for first time tablet user like me.The only reason I have to like about this tablet is because it's bigger than the ipod.Again, where are the games?Without a manual you have to figure out things for yourself.I will probably edit this review as I go along.

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it!
Reviews.Author: Lisa J. Bryan
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my teenage daughter.  She says she hasn't had any problems with it at all and it works just fine.  Can't be more specific since I'm not the primary user, but as long as she's happy with it, so am I!

Reviews.Title: I use it all the time!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Bullock
Reviews.Content: I use this tablet all the time! The 2nd layer apps are great and is so versatile for the price. It is pretty much a Nexus 7, just a tiny slower in speed, but not much for the tablet tech. Just be sure to invest in a case and screen protector. Works great for evernote and quick photos as well!

Reviews.Title: Love it 100%
Reviews.Author: Rebecca DiNapoli
Reviews.Content: Love it, Love it, Love it!!! It is better than I expected and my kids love it more than the ipad!

Reviews.Title: ASUs Memopad
Reviews.Author: Ann Schlosser
Reviews.Content: Great price.  The quality of the product is outstanding.  Easy to use and screen quality is great.Granddaughter hasn't set it down since Xmas

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Kim Ingram
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I've owned, but I am pleased so far.  I like the clarity of the screen and the speakers work well.  I read the reviews on this and other products when trying to make a decision on what to buy.  This tablet has lived up to those positive posts.  I was looking for something in the under $200.00 range and this certainly fills my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great for school.
Reviews.Author: DAVID SHAPIRO
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter.  She was able to down load apps that helped her get her best grades! Dynamic screen.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Handmaiden to the breed"
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift and the giftee has been so thrilled with this baby (said it was like a puppy, she couldn't put it down) that I ended up getting on for my sister and moi. Sister loves this also. I really like that I can carry it in my purse ( I own a Galaxy 2 10.1 ) This MeMo pad is just as clear almost as fast and simpler to use. Mine came with a screen protector on it (I didn't realize at the time). I added a sd card,  and got a pretty case for protection. Good to go. Battery life is fine (best to turn off GPS and turn on eco settings. The on off button has a different feel than the Galaxy tab so it took me a few minutes to turn it off. Reading the manual is a wise thing.All in all, a fine choice for the budget conscious. Got mine on a $129.00 sale

Reviews.Title: Great for a 9 year old
Reviews.Author: Tria Thao
Reviews.Content: My 9 year old daughter has been wanting a tablet.  I was a little hesitant on ordering this one but of course reviews sold it to me.  So far, my daughter's enjoyed it.  I just don't know how to watch movies on it but it isn't for me anyway.  For the price and quality, I'm happy with it as well as my daughter.  However, the battery use to last long wen we first got it.  Now it has to be charged everyday otherwise it'll milk the battery life quick.  Before, the battery lasted for days before charging it but now it's only good for the day.  Overall, great price for it!!! I'd probably order another again...

Reviews.Title: Far exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Just got this tablet today and I'm thrilled with it. I have an IPad for use at my job and the screen clarity of my new Asus is at very least as good as my iPad. All programs I've installed have ran smoothly and I really feel like I got more tablet than I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet, Great Price.
Reviews.Author: T. Brown
Reviews.Content: Purchased two of these tablets as Xmas gifts for my teenaged nephew and niece. They have yet to put them down, even for food or water. Excellent technology for what they require (school and play) at a great price point. On a related note, these and the dozen+ other gifts I ordered for the Holidays arrived on time and in perfect shape. Kudos to Amazon and UPS (and FedEx) for continuing to lead the world in innovative product delivery, despite the bellyaching of a distinct minority who believe once you hit "order" at 11:59 pm on December 23rd that all your Christmas dreams will magically come true.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it
Reviews.Author: Patricia Bynoe
Reviews.Content: My first android device and it is quite an experience. It comes on in mere seconds (unlike my previous tablet which took all of three minutes to warm up), it is supersensitive to touch and I can work with it in one hand for a long time because it is so light and comfortable to hold but most of all I can easily find Asus brand accessories for it. I just wish there were more English language apps and less of the Middle-eastern/ Arabic type language apps that I am finding.

Reviews.Title: its good but could be better
Reviews.Author: Jodan Daniel Marte
Reviews.Content: with technology as advance as we have now and the cost of system on a chip getting cheaper. asus being the giant that it is could have made this tablet faster and better. But compare to the other tablets out around the same price this tablet brings more to the table and its better than most except maybe the hisense sero 7 pro, now that is a tablet that gives you a lot for your money

Reviews.Title: Great pad
Reviews.Author: Jane Kehoe
Reviews.Content: This pad was given as a gift to teenage computer geek and they love it! I let her set it up for her needs (music and gaming) so far it is doing great

Reviews.Title: Very well received.
Reviews.Author: Johnny L. Schneberger
Reviews.Content: Timely arrival.  Product was as advertised.This tablet was a gift.  And though I'm not techie, I can say say is that my G-son was very pleased with the gift.  In fact, my son was also impressed and thought he'd buy one for himself.Very bright screen,  Appears to be well-made.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Richard A Lanuez
Reviews.Content: I got this for a back up one & its just as good as the nexus one that I have. My grand children liked it that I got them one each. You can"t go wrong for the money.

Reviews.Title: White ASUS Tablet
Reviews.Author: WCE1972@YAHOO.COM
Reviews.Content: After extensive research, my husband and I purchased this tablet for my daughter. We are very happy with this product. No issues thus far. I would def recomend this one.

Reviews.Title: it's okay
Reviews.Author: Carlos A. Ruiz Rivera
Reviews.Content: Careful the first few days make sure it is working alright. Mine seem to have some trouble in charging the battery. I send it back got another one and so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Best Bang For The Buck
Reviews.Author: JoJo Rider
Reviews.Content: I compared the specs of the Asus MeMo Pad HD7 with similar tablets and for the price I purchased it here for ($129.99), nothing came close. The only cons I found were a fixed battery and the lack of a HDMI out port. The screen clarity and overall speed are amazing. Get a case, screen protector, captive screen stylus, a memory card, and you’re set.Of all of the purchases I’ve made in the past 5 years, so far this one is hands down the best.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a kindle, but this tablet offered so much more for the same price. It is used mostly by my kids ages 8 and 4. I love that it has a camera. Great deal.

Reviews.Title: Fills my needs completely
Reviews.Author: Robert J Ewers
Reviews.Content: Really covers all my needs very well, including being able to load my memory card from my camera while on trips and upload photos to family.

Reviews.Title: Great value for money! Great fun for all the family.
Reviews.Author: Hans
Reviews.Content: I recently bought the 10" MeMo Pad and also the new 7" inch Memo Pad for my family. It has been a complete success story. My wife is searching the web for professional information, taking pictures in her workshops and classes, even making a video. My son is connecting to his social networks posting selfies and enjoying games once in a while while listening to his favorite music or doing a video conference with farway relatives. My daughter also tries to master some of the simpler games for children. I downloaded Ebooks and have them read out as "good night stories and regarding the games, look for educational games supporting the development of intelligence and logical thinking. There is lot's of good stuff around, It's not all shoot/kill/trick out etc. This Asus HD 7" Memo Pad has been highly appreciated within my family and it turned out to be a very nice gift at an affordable price. Before they were carrying around one of my old laptops (15.6" screen, icore3, 5.5lbs of weight). I analysed what they used it for and decided to buy them a tablet rather than another laptop. Any serious computer work they can do at very well equipped workstations. This tablet was the perfect solution. Ever since they haven't used the Laotop anymore! As to compare it to other tablets: In our country the Asus is not available and we had envious requests of friends and tablet owners (owning Samsung, and others owning some cheap low end brands which at the end cost the same or even more) to get an Asus for them! Conclusion: So folks it's worth studying the test reports of all the tablets/notebooks etc. and be clear about what yre you going to use it for and how much are you prepared to pay for it. This all helps to make a good decision.

Reviews.Title: ASUS REVIEW
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: i  LILKED THIS TABLET VERY  MUCH.  i DO WISH IT CAME WITH INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO DOWNLOAD AND/OR OPEN CERTAIN SITES.  iS THERE ANYWHERE THAT I CAN GET AN INSTRUCTION BOOKLET?

Reviews.Title: mostly happy with it
Reviews.Author: Crazybob
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet. After the frustration of learning android I really like it now. It's well worth the price. Some comments say the case is cheap, I found the case to seem strong. It has a good 8-10 hour battery life on a charge. Only con I have found is that the microphone is not very sensitive and there is no level adjustment. ASUS said to try a factory reset, but that didn't help.I have a stereo Bluetooth receiver(hotspot nfc) and is great to link up to my stereo or digital wireless headphones!Bob

Reviews.Title: Really nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Donald J. Browney Jr. "SuwaneeGA"
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice tablet. I have only had it for a short time but I have not had any problems with it.I have 2 other tablets that I got through Amazon but they came from China directly so they took several weeks to arrive. The last one I got was a Ployer Momo7 which was a nice tablet but it had a ton of fine scratches all over the screen even though it was supposed to be new.After that experience I wanted a tablet coming from a US distributer with a brand name so Asus fit the bill especially since they make the Nexus also.This is basically the original 16GB Nexus only with a micro SD slot that can take a 32GB card. The wifi picks up neighbors that my laptop does not. The screen is beautiful and I have watched movies from Netflix and HBO.The only thing that seems off is that the headphones do not get as loud as I would expect when I try to make it loud it comes with a pop up saying something about loud volume damaging your ears. It might be auto limiting the sound output from the headphones. I haven't figured that out yet. This tablet has a ton of features. I find new things constantly, some that I have not seen in the manual which is not as good as it could be but better than the China tablets I previously bought.What is also nice is that I didn't have to change the default language to English and get rid of a bunch of Chinese apps. I had to root the Chinese tablets to do this. I didn't have to do that with this ASUS. I would buy this again and through the same seller. It is a fingerprint magnet as others have written about so the screen is in constant need of cleaning  and this is why I only gave it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMOPad HD 7 inch
Reviews.Author: Jean R.
Reviews.Content: Took me a few days to orientate myself with this Pad but a phone call to the support line and I was on my way.  Great gadget.  Looking forward to using it when I travel.  Haven't had any experience with any other product but my son (ITT guy) recommended this product.

Reviews.Title: great iPad alternative
Reviews.Author: Monica Hayden
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with it so far. I like the Android OS, and the fact that it is compatible with my phone, also an Android. It is also Google-friendly (unlike my Kindle Fire, which I also like).

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Tony L Mosley
Reviews.Content: My wife already had one of this model, decided to get one for myself. Was able to buy from Amazon for the same price I paid for hers at Sam's wholesale and without a membership card. Plus shipping was free. Thanks

Reviews.Title: A very good buy
Reviews.Author: book reader "book reader"
Reviews.Content: Just about has everything i want to do. I want to be able to record in text while writing like Samsung Galaxy tablet. But i cannot do it with this tablet. It is also a little bit slow in response with my input, especially when changing application. Sometimes it just stopped. Overall, it is still a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Richard B
Reviews.Content: Great for the price.  Could not pass up the opportunity to purchase a good quality device at this price.  Came quickly.

Reviews.Title: Pretty snappy even under the heavy game content.
Reviews.Author: J. Lee
Reviews.Content: Picked this up for my son and we are both very pleased.  Pretty snappy even under the heavy game content.

Reviews.Title: Screen isn't good in sunlight.  Can't read if there is any glare.
Reviews.Author: Paul M. Antolik
Reviews.Content: I have never used a tablet before..this came without any instructions!  It has definetly been learning by trial and lots of errors.  i'm sure there is a ton of stuff I should be able to do with it but don't know how to access.  Screen isn't good in sunlight, very dim.

Reviews.Title: asus tablet rock!
Reviews.Author: michael a mcdowell
Reviews.Content: This tablet is amazing! Id say a must buy ! I got it on sale for 130 so i couldnt psss it up! Evenat full price its worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Terrific!
Reviews.Author: BigJ
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific tablet with lot's of computing power at a very reasonable price.  Glad I got one and would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: memo 7 inch tablet
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: For a tablet this one is more than amazing.The price was very reasonable and the tablet was very comparable to the high priced ones. You can't go wrong with this product.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: Amazing product, got it when it was on sale for 120 dollars, couldn't be happier. Very fast, very clear screen. Buy the Transcover case for it right away, you will not be displeased. As well as an Anti Fingerprint screen protector. Helps a TON with the fingerprints.Best bang for the buck you can have right now. Don't waste your money on a 400 ipad, or whatnot. This is a beast for the money. Good updates from Asus as well, firmware updates are fast and reliable.You may see some reviews talking about how "weird" it is that the bottom is a bit wider than the top and causes an "uncomfortable" edge around the unit. First of all, its barely noticeable. Second of all, its so the Transcover will snap onto the device and you don't have to worry about things coming up around the edges of your screen.

Reviews.Title: MeMO
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: My kids were given the MeMo after my wife and I did a lot of research.  The best thing about the kids using the MeMo for school and fun was the low cost and timely delivery.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the tablet, especially after the latest update 4.2.2.
Reviews.Author: Andrey
Reviews.Content: Pros: good battery life, design and durability, softwareCons: the screen is not too good on the sunlight, but that's the issue with the most of tablets

Reviews.Title: Didn't Last
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Scudder "RSA"
Reviews.Content: Seemed to be fairly clear and responsive.  Died within 4 days.  I have requested another and we will see how it does.

Reviews.Title: Good all the way
Reviews.Author: Chan
Reviews.Content: Nothing negative, delivery and product definitely exceeds expectation!! Thumbs Up!! Will definitely try to make more orders but some cannot be deliver to Singapore!!

Reviews.Title: one of the best tablets in the market
Reviews.Author: jonathan ardila
Reviews.Content: bought it for my Girlfriend, she loves it and its very handy , great product for the price. one of the best tablets in the market

Reviews.Title: You are poor this is the perfect tablet for you
Reviews.Author: BOYAFG "AFG2012"
Reviews.Content: Very good table for the price. If you are poor or don't want to spen a lot of money on a table buy this one it a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Ordered this for my daughter for her birthday!
Reviews.Author: Gena Proctor
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my daughters birthday and she absolutely loves it!!  I think it is a part of her wardrobe!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet with 1.2 Ghz with Quad-Core and Bluetooth !
Reviews.Author: LINDY "Lindy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this 7"Asus tablet for Christmas for my 12 year old daughter.  This is a perfect size for her to take along with her to Grand-ma's house.  The price is unbeatable for the quality your are getting, 1.2 Ghz with a Qud-core processor and it has blue tooth.  The customer review by M. Erb was very informative.  Watch his video, he states that Asus makes the Nexus tablet for Google.  Great info.  The seller delivered the tablet quickly and well packaged.  Thank You !

Reviews.Title: Cool.
Reviews.Author: PK
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our 1 year old daughter. She gets fussy when we travel and this is perfect for her. She watches all her favorite cartoons while we're in the car and she won't fuss at all. She'll also be able to play learning games when she gets a little older. It's not at pricey as the IPAD but it gets things done.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMOPad HD 7-Inch 16 GB Tablet, Blue (ME173X-A1-BL)
Reviews.Author: Francis R. Losche "Poobah"
Reviews.Content: the ease of getting through pages it's a lot faster than what I had before, would recommend it to my friends

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: toby scott
Reviews.Content: It's exactly what I wanted -- an inexpensive tablet I can take with me and not worry about losing/breaking it.  For more money there are better tablets, but this did not disappoint at the price.  Nice job.

Reviews.Title: complete, compact, cool
Reviews.Author: Minneapplemuffin "Deals, Deals, Deals"
Reviews.Content: Very nice little tablet for the price!  I love the pink and how intuitive this product is.  The exterior is a bit slippery and did not come with a screen protector.  A must have for this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great price and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Chris Thornton
Reviews.Content: Great price and easy to use.  I bought for my wife to use on an upcoming trip and she is already an expert with the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: David Seo
Reviews.Content: This is working out well for me.  $20 price drop within a month of purchase not good.  I am in the process of getting an OTG cable to attach a keyboard.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MemoPad-Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Thuy
Reviews.Content: stellar tablet for an awesome price.  works very well, response time is great.  pretty good operating system.  overall, its a quality product.

Reviews.Title: perfect buying choice.....
Reviews.Author: drocaberte
Reviews.Content: perfect choice....i really highly recommend this item to all users. it's all in one memo pad. perfect for my needs...

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: John Rivera
Reviews.Content: Excelente máquina, Super recomendada. It's fast, I can install almost everything, Good price for good machine. I recommend it to you

Reviews.Title: Awwesome
Reviews.Author: Fouad Ahmed
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my daughters and they love it. I am not a big fan of android. However, my daughters love them.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: So far I love this tablet! It's fully capable of handling what I need, netflix, facebook, kindle, etc. I don't game so for my purposes its great.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MemoPad HD 7
Reviews.Author: M. Morine "Kukaepe"
Reviews.Content: I really like my Memo Pad.  I wanted a small tablet to access the internet and my e-mail while traveling without packing my laptop.  This wi-fi enabled tablet is perfect to accomplish these tasks well at a very attractive price.  The larger and more "designer" tablets are very nice but at 3X the price I don't see the point.  Excellent screen and many free apps available.  Great deal, thanks Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: harry Smith
Reviews.Content: Love this tab. It does everything I could ask of it at a great price. My kids are jealous and want one too!

Reviews.Title: The power button is a little hard to get to in the case but overall a very good tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: devildog
Reviews.Content: Bought this for granddaughter basically because of the proven ASUS tables and a normal mini USB for charging allowing us to us any of our tablet chargers.  She loves it!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Carlos André de Paula Mendes
Reviews.Content: great tablet, easy to navigate, well finished, great display, well-defined colors, fast. Only the sound I found a little low, but nothing detrimental games / movies / etc. The battery life is very good.

Reviews.Title: wonderful tablet
Reviews.Author: tony
Reviews.Content: good item and better then other tablet.very easy access.also,very handy for take anywhere you like.also, pretty light for carry any place I want

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Rick Maes
Reviews.Content: Great price for well performing tablet.  Also have a nexus 7 and this tablet is better on price and camera capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet !
Reviews.Author: Roger E. Mundinger "rem."
Reviews.Content: I love the tablet for traveling and is just the right size for what I do with it. It is fast and I have had lots of fun with it.

Reviews.Title: Excelent tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Douglas Borrero Villamizar
Reviews.Content: I'm gratefully pleased with this purchase. This tablet is powerful, ligthweigth, and performs smoothly. The screen resolution is perfect, and the sound is very good. Updates to Android 4.2.2 as soon as you connect it to wi-fi. Really recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Good alternative to the new Nexus HD 7
Reviews.Author: shopper
Reviews.Content: Satisfied after a month of use. $120 less than the nexus I was considering. Will consider more upscale tablet once the operating systems debate is settled.

Reviews.Title: Asus as done it again excellent tablet.
Reviews.Author: The Shadow
Reviews.Content: My initial impressions are overwhelmingly positive. The more I use the tablet the more amazed I am that something at this price point can be so capable. One nice surprise: when I close my tablet cover, the screen automatically sleeps and it automatically awakens when I open the cover. This is by far the best performing low cost tablet on the market today. I may get the 10" version of it.

Reviews.Title: Very usable, cost effective tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Everything my phone will do except the telephone. Only downside is accessibility of on/off and volume switches. Case turns it on when opened which minimizes the problem.

Reviews.Title: Great for the kids
Reviews.Author: Bagehi
Reviews.Content: Bought these for the kids.  They love them.  Easy to use, sturdy, and the charger is standard so can easily be replaced when they lose theirs.  Perfect!

Reviews.Title: It's ASUS, you know it's good
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: While I don't have a lot of experience with different tablets I know I like this one. At first I wondered if something was wrong when it would not work with Netflix. Then ASUS updated the OS (automatically) and Netflix worked without a hitch. In my mind, for the money, you will not find a better deal right now.

Reviews.Title: Lightweight and easy to carry in my purse
Reviews.Author: Mysterious Reviewer
Reviews.Content: The ASUS MeMOPad is lightweight and small enough to easily carry inside your purse which I love. I do own a generation 1 iPad and I love my iPad but it can be a bit heavy and too large for carrying around inside my purse. The ASUS tablet is not and has become my favorite tablet to take to the grocery store as I have used a well-known grocery app to make my grocery store list. I could also use a note pad app to make up my grocery list, if I desired.Other pluses concerning this tablet include:Ease of selecting apps. I found and downloaded several apps for free from Amazon and there are other websites you could do the same. With the iPad it's Apple only as best as I can tell.Reading my Kindle books are easy too as I do believe this was already included with the ASUS tablet.The tablet itself provides clear images and crisp colors when it comes to reading or viewing websites.The one drawback is the ASUS tablet is not as intuitive as the Apple iPad. This could be caused by my familiarity with using the iPad versus an android tablet.Another drawback is the non-removable battery used to power the ASUS tablet.Recommend.Penmouse

Reviews.Title: Good while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I received this tablet and was immediately impressed by the screen, it was gorgeous!  The only other small tablet I have used is the Kindle Fire HD, and I much preferred the Asus because of the screen and the very nice OS (I hate the Kindle carousel).  This tablet seemed faster, and was very easy to setup.  I installed a few apps from the Google Play store and it was all flawless.So why 1 star?The battery came partially charged, and that's all the use I've gotten out of it, about 3 hours.  Now it is completely dead.  It will not charge, connecting it to a PC does not help.  I've tried different outlets, different chargers, all to no avail.I probably received a lemon, and will revise my review based on the service I get.Update: I sent the first unit in for repair.  It took a 20 minute phone call or so.  I received the unit back in a bit over a week.  The second unit lasted a month or so.  It was just sent in for repair, for exactly the same problem, it just dies.  My wife really likes the tablet when it works, so we're a bit bummed that it keeps dieing.  Hopefully it will last a bit longer when we receive it back.

Reviews.Title: Not the best experience
Reviews.Author: Emil Jorge Manzur
Reviews.Content: First off let me say I've had many tablets and also ASUS products, but this one is close to the worst i have ever had, right after i received i started experiencing some funny BATTERY OVERHEATING ISSUE, it happened seldomly and the tablet would turn off, over the last couple of months, the issue has developed and now the tablet is useless, it so bad that drains the battery in a matter of minutes, so honestly i wouldn't recommend it to anyone, stick to the M172 its way better and these issues don't happen, extremely disappointed, will think twice before buying this tablet

Reviews.Title: Garbage Asus Tablet
Reviews.Author: Devinder Singh
Reviews.Content: Garbage Tablet. After 4 Month not turning on. Cheap in quality. I saw lots of review not turning on. They should call it back.Not recommended at all. Just Garbage and wastage of money.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Jerry Vanalstyne "radio lover"
Reviews.Content: It never worked from the first time I tried it. I took it from the box plugged it in to charge it. After about 5 hours I unplugged it and tried to use it. It froze up  and would never work.Amazon was great about the problem and I returned for refund.I also returned a cover I bought for it which was fine but since I don't have the asus I won't need the cover.I'm hopeing amazon doesn't charge me the shipping for returning it.True there's nothing wrong  with it but I can't use it because of no fault of mine. i giving 2 stars for easy returns to amazon

Reviews.Title: waste of money ( updated review)
Reviews.Author: shawn911 "shawn911"
Reviews.Content: This device has been shutting down over and over i purchased it for the black Friday sale 2013. It would normally shut down 50 - 40 % of the battery.When it normally shuts down it would come on the following day. This would only happen when plugged to the charger and in doing so there is a always flashing of the battery symbol in red. Yesterday 24th march 2014 it recently shut down at 100% of the battery  and won't come on.!!! I also know another asus user who purchased their device same time around like i did and is encountering the same issue. the funny thing is I made another purshace of this item not to long ago  i await to see if it is going to do the same thing.DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!MY SECOND PURCHASE OF THIS DEVICE STILL HAS ISSUES. THE SECOND ONE HAS DIFFICULTY POWERING IT UP.HOLDING THE POWER BUTTON FOR THE REQUIRED TIME WONT HELP. PLEASE GET ANOTHER PRODUCT DONT PURCHASE THIS ITEM!!!

Reviews.Title: Five Stars For Amazon's Return Policy
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet when the battery does not give you problems. Really great. I got two returned both because of battery problems. Amazon was good enough to give me my money back on both occasions.But, I missed the tablet. It's that good. So, I bought another and, so far, the battery has not given any problems. Hence, the 4 star rating.I think the trick is to never turn the thing off. Just keep on charging as recommended on the internet.

Reviews.Title: Battery stopped charging
Reviews.Author: Donna Wynn "Retired RN on a spiritual journey."
Reviews.Content: The tablet won't charge, I did everything because I like the tablet, changed plugs tried different sockets, nothing.  Saw this review from a customer today...............UPDATE: 1/2/2014 - Some bad news. My MemoPad refuses to charge now. Suddenly, I plugged the MicroUSB cable to the MemoPad for charging yesterday and nothing happened. I checked the plug and it was fine but I tried two other cables just to ensure it wasn't a flaky cable. It wasn't. Also checked it with several different AC chargers and on my laptop. NO dice. It won't charge. I then tried a hard reset by holding the power button for 1 minute, connecting USB to power and repeating the procedure. Nothing. My MemoPad is on it's way back to ASUS for warranty repair. I'll leave my rating intact for the time being. I may have to lower it depending on the outcome. I realize that some defects occur so I will give the benefit of the doubt for now.

Reviews.Title: Lemon
Reviews.Author: Jeff Warner
Reviews.Content: We bought this tablet in late November for Christmas. We really enjoyed it for the first two months. We took very good care of it and followed all the instructions and rules. The tablet will not turn on and will not charge. I have heard that they're a few lemons out there and it just so happens we bought one of them. I am very disappointed in this purchase. We are not able to return this lemon because it's been over two months. I'm also disappointed in Amazon for not giving us a replacement after only two months. What a waste of money!

Reviews.Title: surprisingly great tablet
Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: Got this with birthday money when it came out and pleasantly surprised by the quality. I new I wanted a smaller tablet just wasn't sure which one. Usually in electronics if the price is cheap then the product is. I knew wanted android os for some apps like snes emulator and torrent ones, but there weren't many good choices at the time. Then Asus released the memo and the updated version of the nexus. I picked this over the nexus because the ability to use memory cards. The screen is really nice, but shows fingerprints and is rubbish in direct sunlight. The plastic back doesn't feel cheap and the speaker is nice. I have been using it constantly watching videos, playing games, and browsing the internet. Even with the very heavy use the battery still lasts all day on one charge.

Reviews.Title: HOW COME ASUS TURNS OUT SUCH PRODUCT.
Reviews.Author: chunglouie
Reviews.Content: I  GOT THE MACHINE IN OCT. IT CANNOT CONNECT WITH YOUTUBE ALL THE TIME. 2/8. IT TURNS DARK IN SCREEN TOTALLY WITHOUT WARNING. VERY UPSET FOR THIS PRODUCT. IT IS NOT EVEN PASS QUALITY CHECK. SHAME TO ASUS.

Reviews.Title: Failed to work after a 90 days
Reviews.Author: mp3dude
Reviews.Content: i was using this tablet for facebook or some games and after about 90 days it failed to work it wont turn on and im very dissapointed , i even got the square trade warranty and they say i have to contact the manufacturer to get it fixed im very frustrated with this tablet :(I don't recommend it to anyone you should get the nexus 7 2013 its way better.

Reviews.Title: Bad present!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth S.
Reviews.Content: My MeMO died after about ten days. Just wouldn't turn on anymore. Major dissapointment to the owner who is nine and treated it like it was made of eggshells.

Reviews.Title: Less than a month and sending in for repair.
Reviews.Author: russting
Reviews.Content: Second issue in less than a month. Had to factory reset the first time, second time had to send in for repair. Piece of Junk.

Reviews.Title: Don't trust this seller!
Reviews.Author: RT
Reviews.Content: Lied to about delivery date for days.  Sent me an email asking if I was satisfied with a link for the review practically flashing in my face,  A small part, were you would miss it, asked me to let them know If I wasn't satisfied and they would make it right.  I did and it has been a month now with no response back.  This was $30 more than normal with the guaranteed LIE!Find someone else to buy this product from.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't purchase again
Reviews.Author: Muffy
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on tablets and settled on this make and model. I narrowed it down to this and a Nexus 7. The deciding factor between this and a Nexus was the SD Card storage and price.The screen on the ASUS is wonderful, the processor fast and the speakers are decent.What's wrong with it:the touchscreen controller is very laggy, the applications are severely lacking and the SD card slot keeps losing connection with my card. It doesn't have applications that are standard on most devices such as swype or a video player that plays anything but mp4. The annoyance factor with this tablet is sky high. The volume control button is right next to the power button, so half the time you want to turn it up, you turn it off. Arrgh. I wouldn't hold my breath waiting for ASUS to update to KitKat 4.4 either.I'm going to see if I can get the SD card slot fixed under warranty and give it to the kids.

Reviews.Title: Pray you don't have problems with it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We purchased one of these for my daughter for Christmas.My wife charged it fully on the 23rd or 24th of 12 hours.My daughter loved it used it none stop all during Christmas vacation, downloaded required reading to it and after school started was using a planner function to keep track of assignments etc.Awesome.Then it quit working one evening. It wouldn't respond. This was the second week of January.So, the following day I began my search for the correct customer service phone number to call, not nearly as easy as it should be. Finally I found the number and began wading through the warranty mire. To begin with this process is long and drawn out and be sure to have the original box that the unit came in with you, you will need that. After completing the questioning and plugging the tablet into the charger as asked, I was asked to hold the "on" button in at which time the charging icon began to show up intermittently. I was told to let the unit charge for 30 minutes and see what happens. I requested and received a warranty or incident number, thinking I wouldn't have to jump through all of the hoops again. About 10:00 pm it finally had a full charge and worked normally another few days, then failed again.We charged it overnight, nothing. Another call, this is when I found that the previous incident number apparently meant nothing because I had to repeat all of the information again, asked to perform all of the same trouble shooting tasks, again. Now, in my mind to me with a product like this when it is determined that the customer isn't doing something stupid and there is something wrong with the tablet the company should issue a call tag have the unit picked up and as soon as they receive it ship a new one to the customer and sold the repaired on as a refurbished tablet. This isn't what happened. We had to ship the tablet to the repair center to be repaired. Today we learned, because my wife was vigilant that the customer service representative we talked to had managed to misspell or address, which is staggering because to my recollection I gave them our address no fewer than three times, carefully spelling it each time.The tablet worked fine while it worked, which is why I gave it two stars. The failure of the unit after only two weeks and then the abysmal customer service makes me waiver on the two stars leaning toward lowering it to one.I would not recommend this unit to anyone. I would recommend an android tablet however.

Reviews.Title: Wish I spent more on the Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: Rick E.
Reviews.Content: slower processor and graphics card than the Nexus 7. Parts of the touch screen no longer work. I've only had it since September 2013 and it was even lost under a bed for 3 of those months.

Reviews.Title: Won't turn on after 3 weeks using
Reviews.Author: K. Moran "K. Moran"
Reviews.Content: This tablet was pretty nice, but I had noticed that it wasn't doing updates at the same time the other one I purchased had been doing. (I bought 2 at the same time) Great screen. Decent sound. Fairly fast and ran well UNTIL after using 3 weeks... it will not turn on at all. Will contact Asus on Monday and see how quickly they resolve this matter. I will post an update on my experience with Asus Customer Service and how they handle the warranty. Disappointed. I bought 2 and so far, the other one is still running fine.

Reviews.Title: Worked great for two weeks.
Reviews.Author: Sean Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with this tablet. It has a very solid build and design. Worked great for just over two weeks and then decided to stop charging. It wouldnt even turn on while plugged in. If Asus gets this problem worked out, then it's a great product.

Reviews.Title: Pad did not start or work after charging for more than 10 hours.
Reviews.Author: Beth Ciaccio
Reviews.Content: I had to send it back because it did't work. They did send me a new one, but I also purchased 5 others for Christmas gifts and I hope that they work.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Larissa
Reviews.Content: So far this is the fastest 7 inch tablet I've tested. The quad core processor makes surfing the web quick. I've had many 7 inch tablets and this is one of the nicest. I have not had a chance to try the Nexus but I do not like the idea of not being able to use microSD card for added memory. This is why I ditched the iPad mini. Netflix plays smoothly.  Overall a nice tablet.

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS TABLET!
Reviews.Author: daryle
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A FANTASTIC TABLET! After reading the comments, I was a little concerned about ordering this tablet. I took a chance and I love it.  I am not a newby with tablets.  I have an iPad, an iPad Mini, a Nook Color, a Kindle Fire, and a Nexus.  I reach for this tablet before the others.  The placement of the ear phone and charging plugs are perfect.  When you are holding the tablet in portrait mode, the wires are neatly on top and out of your way.  The on/off button and the volume buttons are also positioned in a comfortable location.  GREAT ENGINEERING ASUS...I ordered the Hot Pink because I am a girly girl and I love it.  If you are considering this resonably priced  tablet, order it and get ready to enjoy your tablet experience.

Reviews.Title: Froze up
Reviews.Author: Ramsil
Reviews.Content: I had it for less than a month and it just froze up on me and I returned it. While it worked, the performance was ok but he on/off and volume buttons on the side were very hard to get to. Overall i was not satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome if they enabled all android features
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet and would rate higher if they didn't disable features. For the money, this is an awesome tablet. However, since they decided to not support OTG (a very common android feature that I need) I reduced the rating and returned the tablet. Their loss!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Jesús Alvarado
Reviews.Content: Overall its a very good device, but it has crashed few times and sometimes lags a lot and not even using many apps at the same time or playing major games, im talking about using skype, draw something, facebook... and thats pretty much it.I was hoping more of a Nexus 7 kinda tablet, but overall for the price its very good and gets the job done

Reviews.Title: good price, works great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great price.  My wife warmed to it immediately.  Transition from a Samsung Galaxy was fairly easy.  The touch is not as sensitive as I expected but works OK.  Front camera seems distorted.  wifi sensitivity is better than the Galaxy S.

Reviews.Title: Broken apps, can't upgrade firmware, update fails
Reviews.Author: bboytruen
Reviews.Content: Day one out of box google play app doesn't work along with many other apps. Resetting it to factory defaults doesn't fix it. Even the update will error and crash. In the process of getting it exchanged via amazon. Hope the next work actually works.It's sleek and feels great. Seems like a great tablet if it only worked...

Reviews.Title: Best buy.
Reviews.Author: PEDRO FELIX ESPINAL
Reviews.Content: Excellent product for the price, it has all you need, micro sd, gps, hd resolution and fantastic screen, well done ASUS!

Reviews.Title: MeMO Pad HD 7 Pros and Cons
Reviews.Author: Weston JM
Reviews.Content: (Updated on 12/2/2013 after Android 4.2.2 upgrade)Overall:Asus has provided a low cost tablet without cutting corners on the internals. The outside is a bit cheap feeling, but the internal features are great. I own a Surface RT, Surface Pro and an iPad 2. I was considering getting an iPad mini to replace the iPad 2, but after using this device, I'm not sure that is necessary. I wanted something smaller and lighter that still allowed me to browse, view videos, get email, compose small documents, get directions, view eBooks and Skype. This device seems to have the bases covered. Not to say the device does not have flaws. Read the pros and cons below for details. But for the price ($130) this device gets 4 stars from me.Pros:I like the size, weight, screen resolution and battery life of this tablet. It plays Netflix videos well. I can use this all day before needing a recharge. And it runs in idle mode for days without a recharge.The viewing angle is very good.I like the access to system setting and notifications with a swipe down from the top.The floating apps are also nice.After I received the 4.2.2 Android update, I was pleasantly surprised to see that I can now add multiple user accounts to the tablet, each with his/her own password and personalizations.Cons:My biggest complaint is the power button. It is too small and hard to find.I am not a fan of the Android file system.The keyboard does not provide great feedback that a key has been pressed. The key changes from dark to blue when you press it. It would be much better if the key got bigger for a moment.The compass app does not seem to work and there appears to be no way to calibrate it.The rear camera that sticks out on the back prevents you from laying the tablet flat on a table, which makes it difficult to type or tap on it without the tablet jiggling or moving.Windows 8.1 has several nice gestures for switching, killing and getting at app features that Android 4.2 is missing.

Reviews.Title: This is a piece of garbage !!!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Yang
Reviews.Content: This is a piece of garbage !!!After charging for 8 hours, 1st time boot up OK.Updated system as instructed by ASUS software.2nd time boot up OK.Headset also works, but the internal speaker is active at the same time.Why would I want to annoy my partner while I have the headset in my ears?That is so dumb !!!After I remove the headset, the power button fail to launch the shutdown popup window.I tried various options, including holding the power button for 8 seconds to 20 seconds.Nothing works, the screen simply goes on and off, but Android is still active.After about 30 minutes of frustrating attempts, the shutdown popup window eventually shows up.I shutdown Android and leave the tablet on the computer desk.About 6 hours later, I couldn't power up the tablet.  Even the Asus logon is not showing.Again, I tried holding the power buttons for 2 seconds, 8 seconds, 30 seconds, whatever ...Nothing works.The screen remains dark and it won't even flash like the previous successful boot up sequence I have observed.There is no indicator lights can be found anywhere.Initially, I thought 6 hours of sleeping ( even though it was power off ) probably have drained the battery.So I use the USB cable ( provided by Asus ) to recharge the tablet.Amazingly, the screen display the battery logo and it goes to fully charged within 10 seconds.So the darn tablet is not discharged in the fist place.Well, now I need help to return this tablet.Anyone has good suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Don't bother...on my 2nd one in just over a month
Reviews.Author: J. M. B. Utley
Reviews.Content: On the first one, within 48 hours the home screen froze and I could not even shut it down.  I exchanged it and it was quickly replaced with no issue from Amazon.  The new one was even sent to me before I had even sent the defective one back.  And now the 2nd one won't even accept the pattern password, unlocking then re-locking immediately.  Shutting it off and restarting has not corrected it.  And since it is 30 days past the purchase date I can no longer exchange or return it.  When it is working, it's a nice, responsive, clear tablet.  Otherwise it's a pain in the ass and I strongly suggest a purchase of a Samsung or something.  BTW...this was for my 8 yr old son.  Even put a screen protector on it and put it in a case.  It has not been dropped, banged on, or damaged in any way.  My son used it sporadically for game apps.

Reviews.Title: smooth and fast
Reviews.Author: duketdub
Reviews.Content: The battery leaves something to be desired, but it serves its purpose. Im enjoying the android platform and will defimately own another android device. In short, battery life and memory limitations are whats keeping this device short of all five stars.

Reviews.Title: touch screen stops working
Reviews.Author: J. Rasmussen "jbred1978"
Reviews.Content: I've had two of these now and within 2 months the touch screen stops working or it fails to turn on.  Buy something higher quality with more than a 30 day return policy!

Reviews.Title: Pls dont buy
Reviews.Author: Amjad
Reviews.Content: First, the camera is terrible. Second, the screen is not good, and third the performance is also terrible. So do not buy

Reviews.Title: Excellent device for the price
Reviews.Author: Andrew Mathenge "World Architect"
Reviews.Content: I use this device mainly to read books and watch movies on Netflix and I find it great for the price ($150). But I've also purchased Autodesk Sketchbook Express, and it's amazingly smooth. The closest device in terms of weight and size would be the iPad Air, but there's no reason to buy an iPad Air for almost 8 to 9 times more money, for marginally better experience. Once of the minor issues is the battery life. When watching movies, you may be able to get 6 or 7 hours. It's OK, but I know that the iPad Air does about twice this. Still, there's no reason to buy an iPad Air just to read books and watch Netflix or draw on Sketchbook, if I can do all that on this device.

Reviews.Title: great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: Had actually got this for my elderly mother so she could skype with family and friends that live out of state.  I had to get familiar with it so I could show her how to use it, and ended up liking it so much I got one for myself! The ASUS is simple, easy and fast... does not jam up  or crash, and the battery lasts quite awhile!

Reviews.Title: Awsome!
Reviews.Author: sunshinye
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love my tablet.  it is the right size. I love the green color.  It is so clear.  I love that it is 7 inches so I can hold it in my hand.  I can't wait to get my case to go with it.

Reviews.Title: charging cord is junk
Reviews.Author: talkin
Reviews.Content: The tablet is nice but the charging cable is junk. I got this as a Christmas gift for my mother in law. She was loving it. Then i got the call, its broke. It was past the return window for Amazon. I drove 20 miles to her house to look at it. She said it wont turn on. I plugged her charger in to it and nothing. Just for giggles I decided to try my Razor M charger and boom . It lit up and said CHARGING. After charging its worked fine. I left her with my cable and bought a new one. If it wasnt for that I would of gave it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We got this and two Samsung Galaxy tablets.  This tablet is a great value and performs well.  I don't regret getting it for our 5-year-old daughter.

Reviews.Title: Definitely no complains
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: This is a decent tablet for the price, I was happily surprised to find out that I didn't feel as limited as I thought I was going to be. Would really recommend this over many other budget tablets, and most certainly over a kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: if you know about these things its ok
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: this tablet is ok for the price and I hope I will figure out how to use all the functions. It comes with no instructions, you have to download 106 pages from ASUS website. I printed them out and they are so basic that they are pretty much no help. ASUS support is also no help. If you contact them good luck getting a response that is useful. I contacted them about getting a good set of insructions because the online version sucks and they responded " You can download instuctions online at ASUS website". WOW no kidding!!!  This tablet is ok and probably a great little device if you can figure out how to use it. The front and rear cameras are nice and getting online is not hard but it will not accept any of my passwords from accounts on my home computer. If you have the time to play with it and figure it out you will probably like it. I'm going to keep it but like I said i's ok at best. I wish ASUS would put instuction that are helpful in the box or online and I would probably be a repeat customer.

Reviews.Title: alright alright
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for the price.. good software.. good hardware.. kinda cheap assembly. Feels very light and fragile compared to our nexus

Reviews.Title: A great budget tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael S Clayton
Reviews.Content: A year or so ago I wanted to get the original Nexus 7, but I held off because it didn't have expandable storage or a camera on the back. The MeMOPad has both and is cheaper too.  I know it may not be the best small tablet out there, but it is a really great value.  I am very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: No video for Netflix movies
Reviews.Author: deepbashi
Reviews.Content: The main reason I purchased this tablet is to review emails and watch Netflix. I find the email management very cumbersome with multiple email accounts. However, the main reason I want to return the product is after calling ASUS Tech service and spending over an hour, none of the Netflix movies display any video, although audio comes through. I did not see the video problem with YouTube. Only Netflix seems to have problem displaying videos. If anyone knows the fix, please share.MFAZ

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Fenglin
Reviews.Content: it is good, but sometimes the apps stop working.  actually something wrong happened after i updated the system, and now it does not work. i am going to send it back to asus to see if they can fix it.

Reviews.Title: problem with display
Reviews.Author: Klouda
Reviews.Content: I had two of them. Both have same problem. Flashing display. For first on low brightness then all the time. another problem - slot for external card was removing the card few times per day.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: Marko
Reviews.Content: Perfect Price/Performance 7" tablet. I'm going to get one of these for my two daughters and wife for Christmas. I wouldn't call it cheaply made (I've dropped it several times and only scratched the edge). I do have to restart it once in a while when I get fast fingers and try to do too much too fast. Other than that, I'm super pleased. Only thing I would like is the ability to update with standard Android rather than Asus, but I'm probably going to root it.

Reviews.Title: A great device in its class of tablets
Reviews.Author: J. L. McNair.
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for a special someone,  and she happy wiith it.  my brief  encounter with the device  was good.

Reviews.Title: ~short-lived~
Reviews.Author: Sukhdeep Kaur
Reviews.Content: Pre-ordered for my father. He used it for 2 months, it worked really well and then it just died. It did not power ON. After dealing with poor Asus customer support (ironically Asus support did not have an option for tablet support), I returned it to Amazon and received a full refund. Thank you, Amazon!Aside, I'm not sure if I could now trust Google Nexus manufactured by Asus. I am sure under the hood Nexus is using the same hardware as this MeMOPad.

Reviews.Title: Memo Rocks!!
Reviews.Author: muneca
Reviews.Content: I bought this little gem after returning a kindle fire hd 16gb that was nothing but trouble.  The fire crapped out within 8 hours of unboxing it. Amazon customer service is really phenomenal.  They sent a new one, but alas it had the same issues. I was very disappointed. Sent it packing and got a refund.  I looked and looked for a different tablet.  I researched this one and took the plunge.  I have had it for over a week and it is awesome!!  Not a single glitch, performs flawlessly. The HD picture is fabulous. It runs netfix without a hitch. Google has tons of great apps. The camera (which the fire did not have) takes great pictures.  I could not be happier with this purchase.  It was less expensive than the Kindle and has expandable memory, microphone, and front and back cameras.  The only thing that is not quite as good as the fire is the sound.  The sound on the memo is very good, but the dolby on the fire was incredible. I would highly recommend the moko cover for it. It fits like a glove and is so well made.  All the cutouts for cameras and buttons fit perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: MARGARET C DENTICE
Reviews.Content: I have had this tablet for about a week and . it has been performing wonderfully. Occasionally the screen isn't as responsive as I would like but I have a much more expensive Lenovo tab that can do that too. This tablet I am highly recommending as a very reasonable device.

Reviews.Title: All excellent but micro-HDMI port
Reviews.Author: yi b doo
Reviews.Content: Everything one could expect from this $149 (now $20+ cheaper) tablet is as stated in most positive comments already. One thing it is missing is a micro-HDMI output port...unless if I can wait till Asus miracast dongle to drop to Chromecast's level.

Reviews.Title: Lacks multi-user setting out of the box; it MIGHT update. Otherwise, feels solid.
Reviews.Author: Thomas M. Meadows
Reviews.Content: (My original review is below, I have added updates further below. Overall this seems like a good tablet for the price, especially considering the features)Lacks the multi-user setting. We bought this tablet SPECIFICALLY for use between my wife and my two preschool children. Other Android 4.2 devices have a multi-user setting. I cannot find it on this one, it is NOT listed under the "Settings:Device" menu like the others.This is ridiculous.At a glance (Day 1), the tablet is very fast, seems to be plenty refined and feels good in the hand. No complaints about the build or quality so far, but I will not rate this any higher than 3 stars until they fix this lack of multi-user function, or until I find it buried somewhere in the settings menu in a place that no other device seems to have it.[EDIT]Despite attempting to get the pad to do software updates to get to using Android 4.2.2 yesterday (and being told every time that I was up to date), it decided to update today to 4.2.2. This DOES give me the multi-user function, but it's very buggy.On my secondary  user account, apps often seem to freeze unless you switch from one app to the other using the floating app key. If you momentarily leave an app, and return, it will be running fine again and complete whatever command you gave it that froze it. Doesnt' always happen, and doesn't happen on every app.Either way, at least the multi-user function is working.I have had no other issues with the tablet, and for now I will consider these to be minor bugs that will be worked out.MARCH 2014So far this tablet has been pretty good, but we've simply abandoned the multi-user setting now. Just too buggy. Other than this, the tablet works great. Good battery life, quick processor.

Reviews.Title: Great 7" Pad..  I Love It...
Reviews.Author: Chuckhere
Reviews.Content: The Quad Core is as fast as the Nexus 7, and I love the pic's, that the 5 magapixel camera takes, which Nexus 7 does not have. (at the old-one, did not have).  WiFi works Great ! ! !

Reviews.Title: Quality tablet at a bargain price
Reviews.Author: Matthew Guglielmo "Matt"
Reviews.Content: This tablet (while nowhere near a Galaxy Tab) is a very, very decent tablet for $150... I would actually say I got way more than I paid for. There is no lag, boot times are about 15 seconds, and the Android OS is sprinkled with only very light and descreet ASUS application (of which I do use a few, the calendar in particular, syncs with your google calendar and has a very nice GUI). And the Asus transcover for it (while its a little pricey) is a GREAT case, its unobtrusive and it turns off the screen when you close the flap.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Edwar
Reviews.Content: Good product I like. It is useful and cheap relative to their performance apliamente not recommend it okey, fine very happy

Reviews.Title: Very Unlucky
Reviews.Author: Xanarch
Reviews.Content: I have had 2 tablets now go completely dead and are unable to be turned on. I leave them on the included charger over night and get no response. I tried all of the little tricks to get it to hard boot or just get a response out of it. When it worked it worked well. I just want a working reliable tablet and I thought I was going to have that with Asus but they have disappointed me this time.

Reviews.Title: The Most under rated tablet!
Reviews.Author: Mark Mason
Reviews.Content: very good build quality. fast and smooth. light weight.the price is lower than the Nexus 7 1st gen.Having the SD slot is great for expanding memory.I had the old Memopad and the viewing angles where bad. This HDversion a much nicer screen. Definitely Worth the upgrade.

Reviews.Title: this was worth the investment
Reviews.Author: Peta-Gaye McEwan
Reviews.Content: This was my first tablet, it is very convenient and works well. I had some overheating issues and was advised by Asus support team to wipe the tablet, since then I haven't had a problem.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: K. R. Perkins
Reviews.Content: I have a 10.1 inch Asus Transformer and I call this one my "Mini Asus".  Has a beautiful screen as does my larger one.  I do wish it could open up in the Landscape mode like the larger one.  Depending on the app, it is fine turning to landscape.  No problems so far.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: rohina
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this tablet for my daughter who is 12 years old.  She uses it for school, church and personal use.  The speakers are pretty loud.  It seems user-friendly.  It's been only a month or so and no problem of anything as of yet.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Yamile Garcia-Cerra
Reviews.Content: This tablet does everything I expected it to, and when compared to other devices out there, you can't beat the price!

Reviews.Title: Five star for now
Reviews.Author: Roger M
Reviews.Content: Price, value, speed, resolution, all good.I have installed a screen protector (TechArmor)and it still responds well to touch.I have a 16 gb micro sd installed.Nice tablet.

Reviews.Title: Died
Reviews.Author: Anthony Cheng
Reviews.Content: Bought it on Sep 5, delivered on Sep 7th.It was a good pad but a bit sensitive to swipe and caused something non-response clicks.While it worked, works ok.It died yesterday the 22nd, after put it on a known working charger for 10 hours, still cannot boot up.Not sure if I should contact Amazon or Asus.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price!
Reviews.Author: Praveen B
Reviews.Content: Tablet met my expectations, battery life is good and most apps worked fine.At times, I do notice the screen flicker, not sure if anyone had experienced it.

Reviews.Title: failed after five weeks, no return.
Reviews.Author: A. Marriott
Reviews.Content: This item stopped working; one week after my return window with Amazon, that is 30 days. The battery was low, I charged it, and it won't boot up. I lose my photos, my music, my books, my drawings, and Amazon says forget it. This is not what I expect from Amazon. This is the third android device that failed for me, the other two were purchases on ebay. I guess those two failed faster, so the ebay dealers didn't quibble about the return.  but Amazon? What?  I have to eat this 150$ purchase?Guess I will go with Apple from now on, and watch Amazon more closely.

Reviews.Title: My tablet died after 1 hour use.
Reviews.Author: ANDY ALFONSO RODRIGUEZ LOZADA
Reviews.Content: I just used my tablet 1 hour, then began a system update and never finished. Now I have a useless object and a headache.Yo sólo usé mi tableta 1 hora, luego comenzó una actualización del sistema y nunca terminó. ahora tengo un objeto inservible y un dolor de cabeza.

Reviews.Title: Huge Disappointment
Reviews.Author: D. Moores
Reviews.Content: This item never worked right. I was unable to connect to wi fi although all other items in my home have no problem. It claimed to have an SD card slot but when mine arrived it did not have one. I was very disappointed with this item and would not recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Arrived defective
Reviews.Author: sid vee "svicious22@yahoo.com"
Reviews.Content: Within weeks of receiving this product it stopped turning on.  The battery life was never good, a couple hours at most and the eventually it stopped working altogether.  When it was working, it was very slow in comparison with my iPad Mini.  Clearly there was something wrong with the particular one I purchased.

Reviews.Title: STOPPED WORKING AMAZON RETURN POLICY EXPIRED
Reviews.Author: Karen Vargas
Reviews.Content: This product was a huge disappointment, ordered form my son as a christmas gift. I read previous reviews all good. The tablet was given on Christmas; went on vacation immediately after. While on vacation tablet stop powering on. Tried to return via Amazon, the return period has expired. Just an all around bad gift and amazon isn't making it any better! Not happy

Reviews.Title: Died after five days
Reviews.Author: Mel White
Reviews.Content: I loved this tablet for five days: great price, great screen, worked fine, transferred my apps, etc. Second day it didn't want to boot, but I finally got it to work. Fifth day it just refused to boot up, Period. Tried plugging in charger, USB, holding start button. Nothing works. It's a brick. I'm returning it. I may try the Samsung Tab 3. Doesn't ASUS build the Nexus 7? It's also famous for terrible quality control. Too bad, because this would have been nice to have if it worked.

Reviews.Title: A Good little tablet for the price, but has some issues
Reviews.Author: byPryorDesign
Reviews.Content: (I changed the star rating from 4 to 3) My original review was: This tablet is very good quality, the only reason for not giving it 5 stars is that there are not quite as many apps available as there are for other devices. It is simple to use, and has a wide range of uses. It's a good size and has good sound quality.Updated 3/5/14after a couple of months it began to occasionally turn off and nothing we did could make it turn back on. At first, if we left it plugged in overnight or longer, it would turn on again, but it kept getting worse - to the point where it just wouldn't come back on. Supposedly, if you hold down the "on" and the "volume up" buttons at the same time it should force it to restart, but that didn't work either. Asus was helpful, and we sent it back and they got it up and going again. Fortunately, it was still under warranty, so it didn't cost us anything. So far so good!

Reviews.Title: no good
Reviews.Author: sohail
Reviews.Content: it doesnot turn on,i am so angry for this.I don't recomend anybody to buy this better to spend $100 more buy samsung

Reviews.Title: Bluetooth is bunk
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Neill
Reviews.Content: The First one I got work great except the Bluetooth would not stay on. I got it to use as an obd 2 reader on my truck with a Bluetooth device that plugged into my obd 2 port. So i needed the Bluetooth, they let me send it back and sent me another. same issue so i just dealt with it. 5 weeks later it died.

Reviews.Title: Best 7" Tablet for the money...Hands Down!
Reviews.Author: Tony Romeo "ElderGeek"
Reviews.Content: Nice job, Asus!  This is $130 very well spent! Sure it has a few flaws, but so does every other 7" tablet out there. I am very pleased with the video quality, and have been loading mp4 movies on to the 32GB SD card I bought with the Memopad HD 7.  This unit compares almost exactly with the first version of the Nexus 7: Quad Core processor, etc, but it has something that even the new Nexus and old or new Samsung's are still lacking: an SD card slot to increase how much media you can carry with you.  The Asus Apps that come with the unit are actually useful, and the packaging is top notch.  I would suggest a clear screen protector: you finger slides across the screen much easier with one, but, skip the "matt" finish screensavers for this unit. Has the chops to be visible outdoors, and I have not had a problem with this unit connecting to my WiFi network, either at home, or on the move ( sorry, no cell radio available for this unit).  You can have a lot of fun with this, believe me!  Its compact enough, you can use it as a remote ( with the proper apps from the Play Store of course).  My grand kids ( 5 and 12) love them!  They are kind of jaded too: they both have 14" Laptops! It has gone down a bit in price since I bought mine...so take advantage!  You won't have buyer's remorse with this 7" Tablet, especially at the current price! As the owner of a few Lenovo laptops, an IT guy, and the owner of an iPad, I find myself using this 7" doozy more than my iPad!

Reviews.Title: Not so good battery life on mine. Is this the norm?
Reviews.Author: Chad W. Shumway
Reviews.Content: Down 16% in 20 minutes with wifi only, nothing running, black background, brightness dialed all the way down and battery doctor running with all unnecessary apps stopped. At this rate I'll get 2 hrs run time with nothing running. Played Angry birds for 10 minutes the battery down another 11%. Now at 37% and less than 40 minutes total time used the majority doing nothing but looking at the screen. Looks like about 1 hours total use on a charge. Disappointing battery life. So is the advertised battery life of 8 hours based on not using it? Or is my pad defective? I work in electronic design. Not impressed. Anyone having better results?UPDATE Nov14-13: I received an RMA# from Asus. I ship it back today. I will report back on how long it takes and if the problem is resolved satisfactorily. Also I'm not happy the price of the tablet dropped to $129 from the $149 I payed. We shall see. Until then, 1 star stands.UPDATE Dec21-13: It took 3 weeks to be shipped back to me. A little long IMO and a now has a scratch on the display.Hmmn!After putting it to the teswt, it's performance has increased tremendously. Battery life is now on par with the reviews. First thing I did on initial purchase was update the OS. Maybe a bad flash job killed the battery life perhaps, I have no way to know. I'll have to find a way to back up the ROM before running the OS update again.I'm bumping it to 3 stars, 4 is too many. 3.75 maybe. Overall experience kinda sucked. Should have just returned it.

Reviews.Title: GOOD TABLET GOOD PRICE..AND SO FAR TO ME..GOOD QUALITY IN AND OUT!!
Reviews.Author: magbaez83
Reviews.Content: MAN FOR THE PRICE, THIS LITTLE TABLET IS A VANG FOR UR BUCK..LIKE PEOPLE SAY...SO FAR IS RESPONSIVE..IT LOOKS GOOD TO ME THE RESOLUTION ( I DEAL WITH PHOTOGRAPHY )..WHAT ELSE..IT FITS ON MY COAT POCKETS...NOW IN THE WINTER TIME ..MAN IS JUST A GOOD TABLET..MY KIDS LOVE THIS LITTLE THING!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Android 'Nexus 7' like tablet
Reviews.Author: Brad Hanson
Reviews.Content: For less than $150, why pay more. Yeah it might not be as crisp or fast or whatever.  For the price it is an incredible device.  Agree that the screen smudges, but it isn't that much different than other devices I have used.  Good entry tablet.  And the Google Andorid OS will run circles around Apple IOS.

Reviews.Title: Wanted love it but am disappointed :(
Reviews.Author: Sevylla M.
Reviews.Content: So I purchased the Asus Memo pad original version and was very impressed with its functionality for $100 for my kids. Then I thought, "this tablet is so great,how awesome will the next version be?" So, I bought the Asuss Memo HD 7, and was so excited...it arrived, and the screen is super responsive, quad core processor is lightning fast, graphics look great and of course, both front and rear facing camera much better than the original.Here is where I'm disappointed: the battery drains rapidly, and the USB port does not support on the go(OTG) cable. What does that mean? It means that my super cool $10 keyboard with case that I bought from Amazon ( and works great on the older version), does not function at all on this newer version! Cannot plug in keyboard, and cannot read flash drive...rendering what should have been an AWESOME $150 stand alone computing device almost useless for me (and many grownups)...great tab for the kids for gaming and vids, but without external keyboard, this cannot replace my laptop on the go....bummer.UPDATE 10/23/13:  I've resolved the battery drain issue by installing an app killer/battery checker, and this seems to be helping...also making sure to close ALL the floating apps if I know I will leave the unit sleeping a while...also found reference somewhere that the unit hardware CAN support USB OTG, but programmers have not released software fix yet...hopefully that will happen...in general, I'm pleased with the tablet after the initial disappointment.

Reviews.Title: From Victory To Defeat
Reviews.Author: Signetring54 "Signetring54"
Reviews.Content: I really started out loving this tablet. My initial reaction to using it was quite impressive, but then things started to hiccup. On some applications, like Candy Crush, the touch response feature has become quite unbearable. Pressing hard and multiple times with a stylus brings no response. It does this only intermittently, but frustrating none-the-less. I have tried loading music with the micro USB cable from my laptop with Windows 7 on to a brand new 32 GB Class 10 micro SD card, but the device could not recognize the files to play them after inserting it into the on board memory card slot. Something about a wrong format. I also tried loading the music files directly into the internal storage drive, but again could not get the Google music player or one of the top rated music player apps to either read or play them. Today, the unit stopped recognizing my AT&T; U-verse wireless internet connection stating that the signal is not strong enough. Powered unit off and back on with no success getting the wireless antennae to work on the unit. I then tried contacting ASUS for support using their live chat function, but the service is only available M-F during normal business hours. Humph! I've read most of the reviews here, but have not been able to find anyone who has mentioned the transferring music files problem. The Micro SD card also unmounted two or three times for no apparent reason while still being seated in the units on board slot. What's that all about? This is my first tablet experience and I wanted it to be frustration free. It's not going to happen with this unit.
