I will try to contact ASUS support on Monday to see if there is a fix for these problems.Update: Had to do a complete factory reset to get wireless working again. Humph! Have to start over from scratch now an reload all apps. Need to start over from the beginning on Candy Crush. Bummer! Does anyone know if the Memo Pad requires a special format to install music from a Windows 7 laptop using the Synchronization Function from the media player device? I just used this same function to install music to my new Moto X Phone that also uses the Android operating system with out any hiccups. I'm still on the fence about returning this unit!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! We'll see if ASUS support will be able to help with the music play problem on Monday.Update: I've just learned from another reviewer that the Asus Memo Tablet will only accept MP3 downloads. What does this mean to the rest of us? Any CD's that you have ripped to your computer using Microsoft Media Player will not work!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! What? It is a format problem! How come I read all the reviews about this tablet on Amazon and a host of other sites that never mentioned this? I know rhetorical question, but OMG you mean my several hundred dollar library of CD's have now become obsolete! Then how come I was just able to transfer all these files on to my new Moto X Andriod 4.2.2 Smart Phone and play them with out any difficulties! This is absolute nonsense for Asus to have done this, maybe in conjunction with Google, and maybe to try and pry more money out of your wallet. Come on guys these are not eight track or cassette tapes!!!! If I had known this in advance, I would have looked elsewhere for a tablet. If I can't find a program to convert these CD's to an MP3 format, it's going back to Amazon and I will keep reading PDF books on my smart phone that can handle these things.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy with this
Reviews.Author: George R.
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet twice the first one worked about a month. Then stopped. The second one came DOA I wish it worked It was a Christmas present

Reviews.Title: I lost my money
Reviews.Author: Jose S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet on amazon for use in dominicam Republic, after using it for three weeks stopped working, will not start, call customer service and I told their representative in my country, but they said they only give the service to tablets they sell. Now does not that make it is very expensive to send it back to the U.S. again.

Reviews.Title: build quality, plastic screen. manufacturing defects make me want to return it., get Dell venue 7 instead
Reviews.Author: Mitchell B. Fox
Reviews.Content: I have only had it for a few days, and have not had much time to really run it through its paces yet, but I am most likely going to return it. The display, especially. in regard to video, does seem really good. I have not found the device to be generally laggy so far, although I haven't really used it with many apps, under significant "load." My real complaint is with what I saw in some other reviews and was concerned about, the build, fit and finish and overall quality. it does seem creaky, the screen does seem like it is made from plastic, and the one I got had a little glue in the seam between the screen and the rest of the body. That seem seems to be of uneven width around the device and most likely will get other gunk caught in it. I really haven't had a chance to see if it has problems or works well with various apps, but will probably return it. I have ordered, believe it or not, a Dell venue 7, which has 1gb more internal memory, a decent (from what I have read) processor, and an equivalent screen. It runs stock android and is right now at 4.2 (like the asus), rather than 4.3, I think. And it is at a similar price point.

Reviews.Title: Well
Reviews.Author: Travis R. Cole "T.Cole"
Reviews.Content: I am only giving it two stars because it seemed nice for the one day before it died. The speed seemed comparable to my Samsung galaxy s3 and the wifi worked significantly better. But as the story goes I had the tablet for two days before it wouldn't turn on. The tablet after being fully charged earlier that day was at 75% when I went to bed. Tried to turn it on in the morning and nothing. I thought maybe the battery was dead so put it to charge and tried it later. Nothing. Did the 60 second power button push and nothing. Tried charging again through the computer and nothing. End story it never turned back on. Sent it back to Amazon and waiting for a refund.I thought I would add some additional info. I did like the asus additions to the andriod OS. There is a battery monitoring app and also an app usage that can be used to kill idling apps to free up memory.  However the night before my tablet died it downloaded and installed a new version of the Asus software. Not sure if that is what caused it but it worked perfectly fine when I went to bed and I just closed my case leaving it in sleep mode (it should have still been on).  It seemed solidly performing for the price but it also seems there might be glitches in software somewhere as others have mentioned freezing and lock ups.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Dgcl
Reviews.Content: I like it.The resolution is amazing!But the second day, it suddenly it turned offI got to turned it on by pressing the power button and the volume down button at the same time, and now it's still working, so far.

Reviews.Title: EVERYTHING PERFECT EXCEPT MEDIA SUPPORT.
Reviews.Author: moolgun
Reviews.Content: EVERYTHING PERFECT EXCEPT MEDIA SUPPORT.IT REALLY SUCKS.YOU CANNOT JUST DRAG AVI FILE IN TO PLAY.YOU NEED TO CONVERT ALL TYPE MEDIA FILES TO MPEG-4 FORMAT WHICH IS REALLY ANNOYING.BUT THE OTHER FEATURES ARE BETTER THAN MY GALXACY TAB 3 8.0.APPEARANCE IS LITTLE BIT CHEAP.

Reviews.Title: MEGA TABLET FOR MEGA PRICE! (UPDATE horrible GPS)
Reviews.Author: Janet Mieses "Janet Mieses"
Reviews.Content: I had a samsung galaxy tab 2 and this beats everything about it, I loved my samsung but  samsung cant beat it for the price, i got this for 129.99 and the samsung for 170 and this uses a quad-core and the colors are simply amazing, it weights less the the samsung and it uses mini usb2 so i can charge it using my PC while the samsung could not  charge with my pc so i had the used the wall charger which was an awful experience. Now i can transfer files via usb while charging. TUPDATE:THE GPS IS BAD, IT USES AGPS instead of real GPS like the tab 2 had, this is huge problem now for me, because in the road offline no wifi it can reach gps but only when the car stops not while running like my tab 2 did.  In other words the tab 2 still has a really good gps system, this one is horrible.

Reviews.Title: doesn't work properly
Reviews.Author: Williams "Ethan"
Reviews.Content: Well recieved this product yesterday and it Just doesn't work properly. The screen does not rotate at all except for certain apps. The netflix app is terrible, I received some sound but there was no video whatsover. Everything else with the tablet i liked, Switching between apps and all the android features seemed to run very well for the price of this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the money but......
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Good tablet but flimsy,  SD card slot does not hold the card securely and card has to be reseated frequently.  Cheap feel, fit and finish are not great.  Functions well, battery life is good, camera is above what I expected. Screen smudges easily and is hard to clean. Would like a hard case/cover but can't find one.  Sits at a sweet spot for price so I would buy again.  Minor upgrades would make this a really sweet tablet.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Omega Clarke
Reviews.Content: i but this for my cuz,just for her to have tablet experience at her age,but i am impress with the device performance when i play with first i would recommended for anyone how want to get one for someone for the holiday as a gift just to get them into the world of tablet.

Reviews.Title: Arts and Science
Reviews.Author: C120
Reviews.Content: I like this company - I like the products - Buy this product if you like to - Expect the Arts & Science Undergraduate Society to deliver - Nice display - Nice software - Quick - Responsive. No Safari no problem embrace the PHABLET experience - Are you the person phone from a handle computer platform - Stop - No - Don'tASUS no funny biz. The motherboards are nice to.

Reviews.Title: Battery Problem
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: The BATTERY needs charging every time I use the MeMoPad - all I use it for is reading ebooks and occasionally check email.WotUp? Acer?Also, your Deliverer is not coming to my apartment address - just leaves the notice lying around - I only noticed it 3-4 days later.Please ask the deliverer to attach notice to my mailbox - after giving me a call!TX Amazon - your stuff is always good - I will continue our relationship!Best RegardsM.I. Bennetts

Reviews.Title: its 5 star, just missing GPS...hence 4.
Reviews.Author: Manik Kumar
Reviews.Content: its 5 star, just missing GPS...hence 4 star only. Everything else about the tablet is perfect at this little price...

Reviews.Title: AWFUL EXPERIENCE
Reviews.Author: Pedro Garrido
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet august 29-2013 and when I press home button that show me a message the launcher has stopped and dont allow me to do anything, I call to asus support and they told me to fix the tablet I have to send it to him. I have to wait for use the tablet

Reviews.Title: still not with me
Reviews.Author: Ifigenia Rangel
Reviews.Content: Hello Everyone, i still dont have my tablet because i live in Venezuela and i sent it to my sister house in the USA, but i must say that is a very good tablet i dont need to use it to write an excellent review.. my sister told me looks very nice and not cheap at all !!!!i really like it i cant wait to have it  in my own hand. i bought two accesories for it ..Fintie Folio Case for ASUS MeMO Pad HD ME173X 7-inch Tablet Slim Fit With Stylus Holder - PurpleEvecase 7~8 inch Tablet Ultraportable Neoprene Zipper Carrying Case with Dual Hidden Pocket & Handle -- Hot Pink/ Green

Reviews.Title: Standby time
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Wrong color (black vs package marking stating it was blue). Other then that works great. Now to see if I can increase the time before it goes into standby mode.

Reviews.Title: Here is some info on this tablet i'm shareing..
Reviews.Author: CLIFF
Reviews.Content: Manufacturer #  ME173X-A1-BLtablet operating system  Android 4.2tablet processor speed  1.2 GHzstorage capacity  16 GBdiagonal screen size  7 inchesscreen resolution  1280 x 800Wi-Fi capability included (Wi-Fi ready)  yesweight  0.7 ozcomputer battery type  lithium-ionmaximum battery life  10 hoursports  micro USBwireless connectivity  802.11a/b/g/nintegrated speakers  yesimage file formats  jpegmemory card reader  yeshard drive type  eMMCvideo graphics  SGX544audio hardware  Sonicvideo playback file formats  mp4audio playback file formats  MP3warranty length  1-year limitedform factor  tabletoperating platform  Androidtablet processor number  MT8125brand name  ASUSmanufacturer  ASUSmodel name  ASUS MeMO Pad HD 7 (ME173x-A1-BL)postconsumer recycled content  0 %total recycled content  0 %depth  0.4 inchesgift  yesheight  7.7 inchesmemory  1 GBon-the-go gifts  on-the-go giftsprocessor brand  Mediatekprocessor model  MT8125processor type  MT8125teacher gifts  teacher giftstechnology gifts  technology giftstouch-screen  yeswidth  4.7 inches

Reviews.Title: it's no ipad
Reviews.Author: NYC consumer
Reviews.Content: Honestly, as a long time Apple user, wanting not to spend too much on a tablet- it is a bit of a disappointment. I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: no flash player :(
Reviews.Author: terez
Reviews.Content: So far, This tablet is good for generic kinds of functions like reading and using the internet, EXCEPT, That This DOES NOT SUPPORT ADOBE FLASH PLAYER. I am really quite angry about that and it greatly limits my activities and even on sites like facebook.

Reviews.Title: BBB of California - over 1000 complaints against ASUS - read them first!
Reviews.Author: jhix
Reviews.Content: Research the forums and BBB before you purchase an ASUS product.  I received a TF700t whose screen cracked all by itself one day...found out that this is a recurring problem and the BBB has 1000's of compaints against the company - they don't stand by their products - $265 to fix a defective screen when we paid $380 for the tablet?  No thank you, Asus

Reviews.Title: MeMOPad HD 7" 17 GB Tablet, Blue
Reviews.Author: Nancy J. Fox
Reviews.Content: I have hardly used it -- there always seems to be something preventing me from going forward. I have only had it a couple of weeks and hope to master it SOON!

Reviews.Title: Firmware update doesn't work
Reviews.Author: JCIttner
Reviews.Content: We bought this tablet for 1 very important feature - it runs Android 4.2, which should support multiple users login. It's supposedly to be a family tablet, so daddy, mommy, big sister and little brother can each set up our own login user account. Unfortunately, it runs Android version 4.2.1. So we ran a firmware update, which was supposedly to update to version 4.2.2. Nope, nada! Nothing happens. I just finished an online chat session with ASUS tech support. He's very nice, but he has no idea how to re-trigger the firmware update. Just wait, it takes time for update to fully download, he wrote. Yeah, I don't see it happening any time soon. We are returning this one... :-(
